programme.title: Food Unwrapped
programme.desc: Jimmy Doherty, Kate Quilton and Matt Tebbutt present more of their favourite food investigations. Matt Tebbutt visits Italy to find out how supermarkets can sell pesto at an affordable price when the traditional ingredients are expensive. He visits one of Europe's biggest pesto producers and takes a remarkable trip an underwater basil farm at the bottom of the Mediterranean Sea. As sea temperatures change, could squid and chips one day replace fish and chips as our national dish? To see what could be in store, Jimmy Doherty visits Thailand, where squid is a national obsession. He joins the Thai squid fishing fleet to witness a colourful display of night fishing that's so spectacular it can be seen from space.(n)

programme.title: Food Unwrapped
programme.desc: Jimmy Doherty, Kate Quilton and Matt Tebbutt with more food investigations. Dr Helen Lawal investigates whether carb-restrictive diets really burn fat quicker, and uncovers an astonishing medical use for this popular weight-loss tool. And Matt finds out the surprising reason why smoked fish is dyed yellow.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Reality series in which bed-and-breakfast owners compete to have their establishments crowned the best. It's Alistair and Emma Mundell's turn to host in sleepy Lynton, North Devon. Their four-star Castle Hill Guesthouse only opened three months ago, and the B&B newbies are desperate to impress with their recently renovated rooms. The accommodation proves a winner with Mark and Fee and John and Neil, but Mrs Tee is proving more difficult to please, while a ride on the Victorian cliff railway from Lynton to Lynmouth proves hard for two of their guests who are afraid of heights.(n)

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Series in which bed-and-breakfast owners compete to have their establishments crowned the best. programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Four in a Bed

programme.title: Location, Location, Location

programme.title: The Secret Life of the Zoo
programme.desc: Documentary series revealing the secret lives of animals at Chester Zoo. Female rhino Kitani is introduced to her new mate Magadi. programme.title: The Supervet
programme.desc: Series following vet Noel Fitzpatrick and his team in one of the most advanced veterinary practices in Britain. A border collie is brought in requiring assistance with a problem with lameness.(n)

programme.title: Escape to the Chateau

Now she plans to to transform an attic room into a stunning studio for designing and storage. Angel takes her mother for a trip to Paris. Dick attempts repurposing some ancient tools from the outbuildings. As the cherry blossom bursts into life, two friends return to the chateau for their spring wedding, before the Strawbridges throw a surprise birthday celebration for Angel's mother with Dick's purpose-built open-fire popcorn-maker in action.(n)

programme.title: The Dictator
programme.desc: Comedy about an eccentric North African ruler. The Republic of Wadiya's oppressive, anti-western leader is summoned to a UN assembly in New York to respond to concerns about his country's nuclear weapons program.(n)

programme.title: My Cousin Vinny
programme.desc: Courtroom farce about a brash Brooklyn lawyer who has barely qualified before he finds himself called south to defend a cousin who is charged with murder. His ignorance of courtroom protocol and unfamiliarity with the Deep South conspire to place him at a distinct disadvantage, a shame for his luckless relative, who is in fact innocent. Oscar-winning Marisa Tomei is Vinny's lively girlfriend.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show 2019
programme.desc: A look at the biggest films in the UK and US charts, featuring clips of the best movies on offer at the cinema.(n)

programme.title: Blue Streak
programme.desc: Action comedy about a jewel thief who hides his swag on a building site before being arrested. When he gets out of jail, he finds the site is now a police station. His only hope is to pose as a cop to rescue his stash - and, of course, chaos ensues.(n)

programme.title: In and Out
programme.desc: Engaging comedy in which a small-town schoolteacher is `outed' at the Academy Awards by an ex-student who has won an Oscar. He denies the claim to his fiance, friends and family - and to the journalists who have latched on to the story - but they remain unconvinced, especially when they consider his tidiness and love of Barbra Streisand. Eventually, he is forced to question his sexuality.(n)

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Slapstick, special-effects-filled comedy about a shy, overweight professor who invents a slimming potion in order to make himself more attractive to women. The brew transforms him into a super-fit stud, but the effect is only temporary and wears off at the most inopportune moments. A remake of the 1963 Jerry Lewis vehicle.(n)

programme.title: Think Like a Man Too
programme.desc: Comedy sequel which sees the four couples return to celebrate Candace's wedding in Las Vegas. A miscommunication leads to Cedric believing that he has been given the title of best man, and he plans a wild batchelor party. Not to be outdone, the girls try to show that they can match the guys' brash flamboyance, and also put on an extravagant celebration. But the two groups soon realise that the battle of the sexes is not the biggest of their worries, when events threaten to derail the ceremony.(n)

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Exuberant musical based on the hit stage show featuring the music of ABBA. 20-year-old Sophie lives on an idyllic Greek island with her free-spirited mother Donna. When Sophie gets engaged to her boyfriend, she decides that she wants her father at her wedding - but unfortunately, she does not know who her father is. She takes matters into her own hands and invites the three possible candidates to the wedding, without the knowledge of her mother. Will Donna reveal who Sophie's real dad is? And is she as reluctant to see her former lovers as she claims?(n)

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: Feelgood musical sequel following Sophie as she prepares for the grand opening of her own hotel on the Greek island of Kalokairi. Having named the venture in her mother's honour after her passing a year earlier, Sophie must be brave as she attempts to follow in Donna's footsteps. Meanwhile, a young Donna embarks on a whirlwind adventure in the late 1970s as she meets Sophie's three possible dads for the first time.(n)

programme.title: Step Brothers
programme.desc: Comedy. Two spoilt middle-aged men who still live at home become stepbrothers when their parents marry. Forced to share a bedroom and look for jobs together, the pair eventually forge a friendship. But can the family's domestic situation ever be harmonious?(n)

programme.title: Action Point
programme.desc: Comedy. Expect spills and thrills along with the laughs as Johnny 'Jackass' Knoxville stars in this raucous comedy about a daredevil and his pals who design and build their own theme park.(n)

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Exuberant musical based on the hit stage show featuring the music of ABBA. 20-year-old Sophie lives on an idyllic Greek island with her free-spirited mother Donna. When Sophie gets engaged to her boyfriend, she decides that she wants her father at her wedding - but unfortunately, she does not know who her father is. She takes matters into her own hands and invites the three possible candidates to the wedding, without the knowledge of her mother. Will Donna reveal who Sophie's real dad is? And is she as reluctant to see her former lovers as she claims?(n)

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: Feelgood musical sequel following Sophie as she prepares for the grand opening of her own hotel on the Greek island of Kalokairi. Having named the venture in her mother's honour after her passing a year earlier, Sophie must be brave as she attempts to follow in Donna's footsteps. Meanwhile, a young Donna embarks on a whirlwind adventure in the late 1970s as she meets Sophie's three possible dads for the first time.(n)

programme.title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
programme.desc: Motor racing comedy about a champion NASCAR driver whose cosy position alongside his best friend at the top of the championship is threatened by a flamboyant French newcomer. With his confidence shattered, the driver draws on the help of his father and some eccentric training techniques to claw his way back to the top.(n)

programme.title: 12 Rounds
programme.desc: Action thriller. A New Orleans detective must complete 12 perilous challenges devised by a criminal mastermind in order to secure the safe release of his kidnapped girlfriend.(n)

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: Gritty, action-packed reworking of the classic tale. After clashing with a Norman knight in an effort to save the life of a poacher, a Saxon noble is stripped of his title and land. Branded an outlaw, he flees to the forest, where he assembles an army strong enough to bring about the downfall of Prince John.(n)

programme.title: Fast & Furious - Hobbs & Shaw: Special
programme.desc: Sky Cinema delves into the hotly-anticipated action-packed spin off starring Dwayne Johnson, Jason Statham and Idris Elba.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
programme.desc: Fantasy. The eighth instalment of Star Wars follows the journey of Rey, who is helped by Luke Skywalker to develop her powers. She tries to persuade Luke to save the galaxy once more as the Resistance prepares the fight against the First Order.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
programme.desc: Special effects-laden prequel to the 1977 classic Star Wars. When the evil Trade Federation - headed by Darth Sidious and his powerful henchman Darth Maul - plots to take over the peaceful planet of Naboo, Jedi Knight Qui-Gon Jinn and his apprentice Obi-Wan Kenobi embark on a mission to save the planet. Fans of the trilogy will be particularly interested to discover the origins of Darth Vader.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones
programme.desc: The second prequel to the classic Star Wars trilogy follows the fortunes of Jedi Knight Obi-Wan Kenobi and his headstrong apprentice Anakin Skywalker, who have been charged with protecting Queen Amidala from a mysterious assassin. Rival factions vie for supremacy as Anakin's feelings for Amidala grow.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
programme.desc: Animated continuation of the Star Wars saga. With peace in the galaxy shattered by the onset of the Clone Wars, Obi-Wan Kenobi and Yoda lead the massed clone ranks into battle against the forces of the dark side. Meanwhile, heroic Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker and his Padawan apprentice take on Count Dooku and his nefarious henchmen.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
programme.desc: The final prequel in the Star Wars saga sees young Jedi Anakin Skywalker increasingly lured to the dark side of the Force. With war raging and the Galactic Republic corrupted by an evil Sith Lord, Anakin must turn his back on his friend and mentor Obi-Wan Kenobi in order to try and save his new wife Padme, a course of action that will lead him to become Darth Vader.(n)

programme.title: Solo: A Star Wars Story
programme.desc: Sci-fi blockbuster. On a daring adventure through the criminal underworld, Han Solo befriends his future co-pilot Chewbacca - forming a bond that will shape the fate of the galaxy.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars
programme.desc: Sci-fi classic in which a simple farmboy is told that he is the last of the Jedi, a race of noble warriors protected by the mysterious `Force', and is sent on a mission to protect the universe from the evil Empire and rescue a beautiful princess. Luke Skywalker is aided on his mission by two robots, a hairy `wookie' and a maverick space pilot, Han Solo. His quest will bring him face to face with the evil Lord Darth Vader.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
programme.desc: Following an Imperial attack on a rebel base, Luke Skywalker undergoes Jedi training from the mystic master Yoda. But he is forced to cut his apprenticeship short when Han Solo and Leia are double-crossed and delivered into the menacing clutches of Darth Vader, who has an almighty revelation in store for young Skywalker.(n)

programme.title: Nanny McPhee
programme.desc: A widowed father cannot manage his seven children whose monumentally bad behaviour has driven away 17 nannies to date. Enter the mysterious and somewhat scary Nanny McPhee who uses magic to win the children over. Emma Thompson, who stars, also wrote the screenplay, based on the Nurse Matilda books by Christianna Brand.(n)

programme.title: The Cat in the Hat
programme.desc: Humorous adaptation of the classic Dr Seuss children's book, in which two housebound children are visited by a cat who saves them from their rainy-day boredom by bringing mayhem to their house.(n)

programme.title: Ploey: You Never Fly Alone
programme.desc: Animation. A plover chick who has yet to learn how to fly gets left behind when his family migrates south from Iceland in the autumn. Now he must learn to fend for himself in the Arctic winter, trying to keep warm, find food and evade predators if he is to survive until the spring.(n)

programme.title: The Smurfs 2
programme.desc: A second dose of Smurfing fun with this madcap mixture of live action and animation. Evil wizard Gargamel desperately wants the Smurfs' powerful magical essence to turn his own mischievous Smurf-a-likes into bona fide Smurfs. Needing one of the little blue creatures in his grasp to do so, Gargamel kidnaps Smurfette and takes her to Paris. Can Gargamel's Naughties sway her to the dark side?(n)

programme.title: Smallfoot
programme.desc: Animated family film. An epic journey ensues when a Yeti named Migo stumbles across a real human being and is banished from his snowy home when no-one believes him.(n)

programme.title: Lego Scooby-Doo!: Haunted Hollywood
programme.desc: Children's animated movie. The old movie studio faces a double threat from developers as well as a gang of movie monsters. Scooby and the gang come to the rescue.(n)

programme.title: Teen Titans Go! To the Movies
programme.desc: Animated superhero comedy. The Teen Titans want to star in their own movie and head to Tinsel Town with hopes of being noticed by a popular Hollywood film director. However, things go awry when a villain's maniacal plan for world domination sidetracks their dream of stardom.(n)

programme.title: The Smurfs 2
programme.desc: A second dose of Smurfing fun with this madcap mixture of live action and animation. Evil wizard Gargamel desperately wants the Smurfs' powerful magical essence to turn his own mischievous Smurf-a-likes into bona fide Smurfs. Needing one of the little blue creatures in his grasp to do so, Gargamel kidnaps Smurfette and takes her to Paris. Can Gargamel's Naughties sway her to the dark side?(n)

programme.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader
programme.desc: Children's fantasy sequel. The Pevensie siblings and their cousin Eustace return to Narnia as they embark upon a perilous sea quest with Prince Caspian. The trio encounter slave traders, lost lords and sea serpents as they attempt to defeat the evil mist by presenting Aslan with seven swords and saving the magical realm in the process.(n)

programme.title: Smallfoot
programme.desc: Animated family film. An epic journey ensues when a Yeti named Migo stumbles across a real human being and is banished from his snowy home when no-one believes him.(n)

programme.title: Teen Titans Go! To the Movies
programme.desc: Animated superhero comedy. The Teen Titans want to star in their own movie and head to Tinsel Town with hopes of being noticed by a popular Hollywood film director. However, things go awry when a villain's maniacal plan for world domination sidetracks their dream of stardom.(n)

programme.title: Charlotte's Web
programme.desc: Children's animal adventure. A spider hatches a plan to save her piglet best friend from being taken away to an abattoir to be slaughtered. Adapted from the much-loved book by EB White.(n)

programme.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader
programme.desc: Children's fantasy sequel. The Pevensie siblings and their cousin Eustace return to Narnia as they embark upon a perilous sea quest with Prince Caspian. The trio encounter slave traders, lost lords and sea serpents as they attempt to defeat the evil mist by presenting Aslan with seven swords and saving the magical realm in the process.(n)

programme.title: The Sandlot
programme.desc: Family comedy set in 1962 about a boy who smuggles his stepfather's heirloom baseball out of the house for a game with the neighbourhood kids, only to knock it into a yard guarded by a terrifying dog. Panic-stricken, the youngsters come up with increasingly improbable ball-retrieving devices in a bid to make good before they are found out.(n)

programme.title: Perfect Skin
programme.desc: Psychological horror about a woman who draws the attention of a tattoo artist with dark desires. While she is initially intrigued by the tattooist's mysterious nature, her curiosity soon leads to a terrifying turn of events as she is abducted - with the kidnapper using her body as a canvas against her will.(n)

programme.title: Slumber
programme.desc: Horror about a doctor who is forced to question everything she thought she knew as she treats a family whose dreams are plagued by a mysterious force.(n)

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview - August 2019
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema and other highlights showing on Sky.(n)

programme.title: The Matrix Reloaded
programme.desc: Sci-fi sequel. With the machines digging into the underground rebel city of Zion, Neo and Morpheus return to the Matrix to cut off their enemies' power supply. Part two of the trilogy has even more incredible effects and an amazing motorway action sequence.(n)

programme.title: The Matrix Revolutions
programme.desc: Final part of the trilogy that sees Neo, Morpheus and Trinity battling to save Zion from the onslaught of the machines. Neo finds himself trapped in a train station between the Matrix and the real world and must escape to stop Smith from taking over and destroying everything. He must fulfil his destiny and the Oracle's assertion that everything that has a beginning has an end.(n)

programme.title: The Meg
programme.desc: Action horror. After abandoning his crew and raving about a giant shark, navy diver Jonas Taylor loses his family and career. Five years later, his ex-wife is among a team trapped on a sunken sub, at the mercy of the 70-foot beast.(n)

programme.title: Venom
programme.desc: Marvel superhero adventure about the life of journalist Eddie Brock and his alien alter ego Venom. Investigating the true motives of a corporation running unusual experiments, Brock finds himself overrun by an alien symbiote and is rendered powerless to stop the creature's actions when he becomes the host body for the extraterrestrial.(n)

programme.title: Thor: Ragnarok
programme.desc: Marvel superhero sequel. Faced with the destruction of Asgard and a battle against a former ally, Thor races against time to stop a powerful enemy.(n)

programme.title: The Sixth Sense
programme.desc: Thriller about an eight-year-old boy with a dark secret - he sees ghosts. One day he blurts out the truth to a psychologist who tries to help him and discover what is behind the disturbances.(n)

programme.title: The Meg
programme.desc: Action horror. After abandoning his crew and raving about a giant shark, navy diver Jonas Taylor loses his family and career. Five years later, his ex-wife is among a team trapped on a sunken sub, at the mercy of the 70-foot beast.(n)

programme.title: Venom
programme.desc: Marvel superhero adventure about the life of journalist Eddie Brock and his alien alter ego Venom. Investigating the true motives of a corporation running unusual experiments, Brock finds himself overrun by an alien symbiote and is rendered powerless to stop the creature's actions when he becomes the host body for the extraterrestrial.(n)

programme.title: Thor: Ragnarok
programme.desc: Marvel superhero sequel. Faced with the destruction of Asgard and a battle against a former ally, Thor races against time to stop a powerful enemy.(n)

programme.title: Basil, the Great Mouse Detective
programme.desc: Disney animation in which Basil, a Holmes-like mouse detective, faces his greatest challenge when he tries to prevent the evil Professor Ratigan from taking over the world. Featuring the voices of Vincent Price and Barrie Ingham.(n)

programme.title: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure. After his father, the king of Persia, is killed, Prince Dastan discovers the secret of a magic dagger which can rewind time. He must then protect it from a villain who intends to make himself king by rewriting the past, and also to avert the end of the world which could occur if the dagger is misused.(n)

programme.title: Cinderella 2: Dreams Come True
programme.desc: Disney sequel to the original, telling the story of Cinderella's life after she married Prince Charming. Three tales tell how she tries to fit into palace life, what happens when her little mouse friend is granted his wish to become human, and how she teaches her stepsister to smile and find true love.(n)

programme.title: Stitch! The Movie
programme.desc: Animated film about the loveable alien. Stitch is happy as a member of Lilo's extended family, and has settled in on Earth. But Dr Jumba has smuggled 625 of his first alien experiments to Earth, and now the evil Captain Gantu wants them back. Can Stitch and his new friends save the experiments?(n)

programme.title: Planes 2: Fire & Rescue
programme.desc: In this animated adventure from Disney, Dusty Crophopper's faulty gearbox causes a fire that closes down Propwash Junction's airport. Determined to make amends, Dusty heads off to Piston Peak National Park to undergo training as an aerial firefighter. However, he struggles to impress helicopter mentor Blade Ranger - until he is called upon to rescue two campers from a raging forest fire.(n)

programme.title: Bolt
programme.desc: Animated adventure. Bolt is the cute superhero dog star of a fictional TV programme, who does not realise he is part of a show and believes his powers are real. When he mistakenly believes his human co-star is in danger, he embarks on a trek across America to save her life.(n)

programme.title: Princess Diaries 2: Royal Engagement
programme.desc: Romantic comedy sequel. Princess Mia returns to Genovia after graduating, hoping to take over from her grandmother, Queen Clarisse, and rule Genovia fairly. However, evil Viscount Mabrey has other ideas and wants to install his nephew Nicholas on the throne.(n)

programme.title: One Hundred and One Dalmatians
programme.desc: Disney's animated classic about the theft of a litter of Dalmatian puppies by the flamboyant Cruella De Vil, who secretly plans to make a coat from their skins. Working against the clock, London's dogs pull together to mount a rescue operation. The film took three years to make, and the state-of-the-art animation cost an astronomical four million dollars.(n)

programme.title: Planes 2: Fire & Rescue
programme.desc: In this animated adventure from Disney, Dusty Crophopper's faulty gearbox causes a fire that closes down Propwash Junction's airport. Determined to make amends, Dusty heads off to Piston Peak National Park to undergo training as an aerial firefighter. However, he struggles to impress helicopter mentor Blade Ranger - until he is called upon to rescue two campers from a raging forest fire.(n)

programme.title: Bolt
programme.desc: Animated adventure. Bolt is the cute superhero dog star of a fictional TV programme, who does not realise he is part of a show and believes his powers are real. When he mistakenly believes his human co-star is in danger, he embarks on a trek across America to save her life.(n)

programme.title: Mary Poppins
programme.desc: Disney's musical fantasy, combining live action with animation, about a highly unorthodox nanny who takes a job with a family in London. Jane and Michael's father thinks they need a strict disciplinarian, while the children have other ideas - but nothing can prepare any of them for the Mary Poppins approach to life.(n)

programme.title: Wall-E
programme.desc: Computer-animated science fiction adventure. A robot designed to clean up a waste-covered Earth far in the future, falls in love with another robot and follows her into outer space on an adventure that changes the destiny of both his kind and humanity. With the voices of Ben Burtt, Elissa Knight and Sigourney Weaver.(n)

programme.title: Princess Diaries 2: Royal Engagement
programme.desc: Romantic comedy sequel. Princess Mia returns to Genovia after graduating, hoping to take over from her grandmother, Queen Clarisse, and rule Genovia fairly. However, evil Viscount Mabrey has other ideas and wants to install his nephew Nicholas on the throne.(n)

programme.title: Mary Poppins
programme.desc: Disney's musical fantasy, combining live action with animation, about a highly unorthodox nanny who takes a job with a family in London. Jane and Michael's father thinks they need a strict disciplinarian, while the children have other ideas - but nothing can prepare any of them for the Mary Poppins approach to life.(n)

programme.title: The Warriors
programme.desc: A tough, nine-man gang from Coney Island, New York, must make their way home through the unfamiliar territory of rival gangs after being framed for the murder of a powerful hoodlum.(n)

programme.title: Apostasy
programme.desc: BAFTA-nominated drama following a family of devout Jehovah's Witnesses, sisters Alex and Luisa and mother Ivanna, who suffer from a crisis of faith.(n)

programme.title: The Elephant and the Butterfly
programme.desc: Family melodrama. A tale of one man and a little lady as a love rat returns to confront his past, but arrives just as the woman he jilted five years earlier is heading off on an important business trip. Flustered because the babysitter has not arrived, she asks him to stay with her daughter for a few minutes. He agrees, but the babysitter never arrives.(n)

programme.title: Casablanca
programme.desc: Romantic wartime drama. As World War II rages in Europe, a laconic American nightclub owner living in Morocco finds his life turned upside down when the woman he once loved reappears in his life with a husband who is on the run from the Nazis. As passion reignites between the former lovers, the expatriate must decide whether to flee with his beloved or to send her away with her new love, who is of vital importance to the Allied war effort. Considered to be one of the all-time Hollywood greats, Michael Curtiz's Oscar winning film features a screenplay that combines romance, adventure, comedy and intrigue, alongside the classic tune, As Time Goes By.(n)

programme.title: Patti Cake$
programme.desc: Drama about an aspiring rapper who chases fame and fortune as she attempts to make waves in the world of music. White, female and overweight, Patricia - stage name Patti Cake$ - must contend with the putdowns of those who viciously attack her appearance and tell her that her dream is impossible, while also dealing with menial jobs and her heavy-drinking mother. With hip-hop loving friend Jheri on her side, however, will Patricia be able to silence her critics?(n)

programme.title: Wonder Wheel
programme.desc: Drama about a former actress whose life is upturned by the appearance of her husband's estranged daughter.(n)

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: Star-studded WWII classic, inspired by real characters and events. In the supposedly escape-proof Stalag Luft III, the Allied escape committee devise a daring plan to liberate hundreds of Allied POWs into occupied territory. Hiding civilian clothing, forged documents and three tunnels from the German guards is difficult enough, but the prisoners also have to dispose of tons of soil. The film is notable for Steve McQueen's leap over barbed wire on a motorcycle while being pursued by Nazi troops.(n)

programme.title: Downsizing
programme.desc: Social satire comedy. Genial occupational therapist Paul Safranek and his wife sign up for an experimental process of miniaturization. Their new small stature allows them to live it large, in a tiny community of grand houses, and saving the planet by consuming a fraction of the world's resources.(n)

programme.title: Thoroughbreds
programme.desc: Dark comedy thriller about two teenage girls who hatch an extreme plan to solve their problems. Emotionless and scarred by her troubled past, Amanda reunites with the popular and clever Lily - the best friend she has drifted away from over the years. Rekindling their bond under unusual circumstances, Amanda sets out to discover what is amiss in Lily's seemingly perfect life, and soon makes an outrageous suggestion to put everything right.(n)

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Tense space thriller. When debris destroys their shuttle, a veteran astronaut and a medical engineer are helplessly catapulted into the isolated and unforgiving expanse of space, with oxygen - and their chance of survival - running out fast.(n)

programme.title: The Social Network
programme.desc: Drama chronicling the creation of the social-networking website Facebook in 2003 and the subsequent fallout between the key players involved. Harvard university student Mark Zuckerberg finds himself in legal hot water when he is accused of stealing the idea behind the hugely popular site.(n)

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: Violent comedy crime caper centred around three groups of villains intent on retrieving a missing diamond. Two friends team up with a pugilistic gypsy to fix a boxing match, but their opponent also arranges some dodgy betting with the courier of the stolen diamond, who subsequently goes missing. When a gangster from New York arrives on the scene, things really start to get complicated.(n)

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: Sci-fi thriller about a group of scientists who are working to achieve invisibility. Having had some success with animals, one of the team decides to test the serum on himself. However, the effects prove irreversible and the invisible man is driven insane, taking his wrath out on his ex-girlfriend and her new boyfriend.(n)

programme.title: To Sir, with Love
programme.desc: Classic drama about a black teacher who is assigned to a rough inner-city school, where he faces a class of rowdy, undisciplined working-class students. No stranger to hostility, he meets the challenge by treating them as young adults who will soon enter a world where they must make their own way. But when he is offered an engineering job, he must decide whether or not to stay in the teaching profession.(n)

programme.title: Escape from the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: Second sequel in the 'Apes' series. A trio of intelligent primates travel back to present-day Earth to escape the looming nuclear holocaust on their own planet. Crash-landing off the Californian coast and captured by the authorities, they are forced to reveal facts about the Earth's future that human society is unwilling to hear and desperate to alter.(n)

programme.title: An Officer and a Gentleman
programme.desc: Romantic drama set against the backdrop of a tough training school for American navy pilots. One of the new intake falls foul of the hard-as-nails drill sergeant but takes it on the chin and finds the additional strength to help a fellow student who is feeling the pressure. In their time off, the boys meet a couple of local factory girls, and the stories of their cadetships and romances unfold in parallel.(n)

programme.title: The World's End
programme.desc: Pegg, Frost and Wright reteam for the final serving in the Three Flavours Cornetto action comedy trilogy. Gary King, a man who refuses to grow up, reunites his reluctant friends to take a second crack at a legendary pub crawl from their teens. However, attempts to recapture their carefree youth are scuppered as old tensions resurface and the reunion threatens to fall apart. But then the outing takes a disastrous turn, when out of nowhere the fate of humanity falls into the gang's fumbling hands.(n)

programme.title: Kick-Ass
programme.desc: Action comedy about a self-made teenage superhero who teams up with a vengeful ex-cop and his deceptively sweet, hit girl daughter to fight the city's ruthless villains.(n)

programme.title: Kick-Ass 2
programme.desc: Superhero action comedy. Self-made superhero Kick-Ass and sweet-faced, foul-mouthed assassin Hit-Girl try to return to life as 'normal' teenagers, but soon they are faced with their deadliest challenge yet. To seek revenge for his father's death, Chris D'Amico has re-invented himself as the leader of an evil league of super-villains. To defeat their new nemesis, Kick-Ass and Hit-Girl must team up with a new wave of masked crusaders, led by the badass Colonel Stars and Stripes.(n)

programme.title: Closer
programme.desc: Steamy drama. A would-be novelist in a relationship with a free-spirited stripper falls for a photographer. After she spurns him, she begins a relationship with another man and, as the years pass, insecurities bubble to the surface in both relationships, sparking a four-way tug of love. Adapted from the play by Patrick Marber.(n)

programme.title: An Officer and a Gentleman
programme.desc: Romantic drama set against the backdrop of a tough training school for American navy pilots. One of the new intake falls foul of the hard-as-nails drill sergeant but takes it on the chin and finds the additional strength to help a fellow student who is feeling the pressure. In their time off, the boys meet a couple of local factory girls, and the stories of their cadetships and romances unfold in parallel.(n)

programme.title: The World's End
programme.desc: Pegg, Frost and Wright reteam for the final serving in the Three Flavours Cornetto action comedy trilogy. Gary King, a man who refuses to grow up, reunites his reluctant friends to take a second crack at a legendary pub crawl from their teens. However, attempts to recapture their carefree youth are scuppered as old tensions resurface and the reunion threatens to fall apart. But then the outing takes a disastrous turn, when out of nowhere the fate of humanity falls into the gang's fumbling hands.(n)

programme.title: Kick-Ass
programme.desc: Action comedy about a self-made teenage superhero who teams up with a vengeful ex-cop and his deceptively sweet, hit girl daughter to fight the city's ruthless villains.(n)

programme.title: Boys Don't Cry
programme.desc: Based on the true story of Brandon Teena, this acclaimed drama follows the trials of a teenage girl from Nebraska who reinvents herself as a man. She moves to the small-town community of Falls City and is accepted by a group of hard-drinking men as one of their own. However, when the transgender teen falls for a local girl and her real identity is discovered by the men she has befriended, their retribution for her deceit is swift. Hilary Swank received a Best Actress Oscar for her harrowing performance in the debut film of director, Kimberly Peirce.(n)

programme.title: The Bible
programme.desc: John Huston's ambitious attempt to re-tell the Biblical stories of Genesis, in a multi-national account covering the Creation to the story of Abraham and Isaac. Poet Christopher Fry adapted the first 22 chapters of Genesis.(n)

programme.title: The Music of Silence
programme.desc: Biopic based on the life of legendary Italian tenor Andrea Bocelli. Born with a serious eye condition that eventually leads to a total loss of sight, young Amos Bardi - an alter ego of Bocelli - must show resilience and determination as he rises from humble beginnings and pursues his desire to become a renowned musician.(n)

programme.title: Philadelphia
programme.desc: Drama featuring an Oscar-winning performance from Tom Hanks about a gay lawyer's fight against unlawful dismissal by his homophobic employer. Forced to lead a double life because of the bigoted views held by his law firm, he discovers he is HIV-positive during a routine medical examination and is soon afterwards is fired for incompetence. But the only man willing to take on his case is a sharp, unscrupulous lawyer.(n)

programme.title: Notorious
programme.desc: Biopic charting the life and death of hip hop star Notorious B.I.G, whose drive-by murder is still unsolved. A rags-to-riches tale from drugs and big dreams to the highlife of rap superstars with all the bling, champagne and entourage. Featuring concert scenes and depictions of major events and figures such as Tupac, Lil' Kim and Faith Evans.(n)

programme.title: Cocktail
programme.desc: Lively romantic drama about a handsome, materialistic young bartender who begins to reassess his priorities when he finds love. Working in an up-market Manhattan venue, he stages an elaborate cocktail-mixing act with a flashy, older colleague. When the pair fall out because of a woman, the deflated young man heads off to Jamaica where he encounters a beautiful waitress who makes him think again about his decision to swear off romance.(n)

programme.title: 28 Days
programme.desc: Emotional comedy drama about a hard-drinking New York journalist who takes her reputation as the life and soul of the party too far when she knocks over her sister's wedding cake and crashes the bridal limousine. A court orders her into rehab for a month, which she initially refuses to take seriously. However, when she meets others with substance abuse problems and talks to the counsellor, she gradually starts to change.(n)

programme.title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
programme.desc: Remarkable fantasy drama telling the story of a man who ages in reverse. Born with the appearance of a wrinkled old man in the last days of World War I, Benjamin Button's mother dies in childbirth and he is abandoned by his horrified father. Benjamin is taken in by a sympathetic couple, and as he advances in years he regresses physically and mentally, with bizarre consequences.(n)

programme.title: The Mountain Between Us
programme.desc: Drama about two strangers who must rely on each other to survive after a freak accident. Stuck at an airport thanks to bad weather, a neurosurgeon travelling to perform an operation and a bride on the verge of missing her own wedding day decide to charter a flight together to beat the storms. When the pilot has a stroke and the plane comes down in the mountains, however, it is left to the duo to look after each other and make it through injury, hunger and many other life-threatening challenges.(n)

programme.title: Fifty Shades Freed
programme.desc: Final instalment of the romantic drama based on the best-selling book series by EL James. Now married and adjusting to their domestic bliss, Christian and Ana find their honeymoon interrupted by the sinister plans of a shadowy face from the past out to disturb the happy union. Forced to spend her life looking over her shoulder, Ana soon finds herself stifled as she attempts to stay on top of work responsibilities and maintain her independence.(n)

programme.title: The Hurricane
programme.desc: Prison drama based on the true story of Rubin 'Hurricane' Carter, a young black boxer whose life was blighted by racism and whose career was curtailed by being unjustly imprisoned for murder. In prison, he struggles to hold on to his pride and writes an autobiography. When a African-American boy and his Canadian friends read the book, they become convinced of his innocence and are motivated to battle a racist establishment.(n)

programme.title: Con Air
programme.desc: High-octane blockbuster set aboard a federal aeroplane transporting convicts to a maximum security facility. One man on board, due for release on parole after eight years in prison, little realises that this flight home will turn into a disaster when the prisoners hijack the aircraft. In a race against time, he joins forces with the US Marshal to prevent the criminals from blowing the plane and all on board to pieces.(n)

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: Drama about a woman who feels let down by the justice system which grants her violent husband access to their two children. After her husband abducts the children and vanishes, she takes refuge in the solitude of the desert, where she makes a new career as a tracker. When a young girl disappears, she has to confront her feelings about her own children, and comfort the missing girl's mother.(n)

programme.title: Distorted
programme.desc: Crime. A woman becomes suspicious of the luxury apartment she has just moved into as she begins to receive a series of disturbing subliminal messages.(n)

programme.title: Collateral Damage
programme.desc: Explosive action thriller in which a firefighter, frustrated at the lack of progress being made in the investigation into a terrorist bombing which killed his wife and child, decides to go after those responsible himself.(n)

programme.title: Blood Brother
programme.desc: Action thriller. An avengeful convict is released from jail after 15 years, and he is coming straight for the old pals he feels betrayed him, including one who is now a cop.(n)

programme.title: Paycheck
programme.desc: Sci-fi thriller. A scientist agrees to take on a top-secret job for $90 million, in exchange for having his memory of doing the job erased. When he wakes up penniless he must piece together the events of the last three years - and when he discovers what he was duped into creating, he has to stop his paymasters from getting their hands on it.(n)

programme.title: Breaking In
programme.desc: Crime thriller. Following the sudden death of her estranged father, a mother of two is left with the task of preparing his estate in rural Wisconsin for sale, bringing her young daughter and son along for the journey. While the home evokes memories of her own childhood, her trip down memory lane takes a dark turn when the house - and her kids - come under attack from a violent gang of robbers who will go to terrifying lengths to get what they want.(n)

programme.title: Serenity
programme.desc: Thriller. A fishing boat captain faces a dilemma when his ex-wife begs him to help her and their son - by killing her violent new husband.(n)

programme.title: Gone in 60 Seconds
programme.desc: Tense thriller. Car thief Memphis Raines is forced to steal 50 luxury vehicles in one night in order to save the life of his brother, who has fallen foul of a dangerous crime lord. Once the most successful car thief in California, Raines must reassemble his old gang to fulfil the almost impossible mission. His task is further hampered by a rival band of thieves and the local police.(n)

programme.title: Gran Torino
programme.desc: Drama about a bitter, racist old man who begrudgingly realises his need for redemption. A disgruntled Korean War veteran, Walt Kowalski is openly prejudiced, and doesn't hold back when a family of Hmong people move into his increasingly multicultural neighbourhood. However, when the family's teens come under threat from gangs and bullies, Walt cannot help but intervene. Begrudgingly he forms a bond with them when they try to steal his prized possession, a 1972 Gran Torino car.(n)

programme.title: BlacKkKlansman
programme.desc: Biographical drama about the first black officer to join the Colorado Springs Police Department in the 1970s. Put on filing duty and subjected to slurs from his colleagues, he sets out to prove his worth by attempting to expose the local Ku Klux Klan group - recruiting a Jewish co-worker to go undercover and infiltrate the organisation's ranks.(n)

programme.title: Strange Days
programme.desc: Dark, futuristic thriller, set on the eve of the new millennium, about a black-market trader who deals in stolen dreams. Ex-LA cop Lenny's philosophy is that anything that can be experienced can be recorded - via a headset device originally developed for the police - and sold. When one of his workers is killed, he is plunged into a maze of paranoia and deception - and uncovers a conspiracy that threatens to blow LA apart.(n)

programme.title: Slender Man
programme.desc: Horror about four teenage friends who explore the legend of the Slender Man. After summoning him, the girls soon find themselves in a world of trouble as they realise that there is plenty of truth behind the story of the terrifying mythical figure. When one of the group goes missing and the others suffer from strange visions, fear begins to take over as the haunting affects every aspect of their lives.(n)

programme.title: Flatliners
programme.desc: Psychological horror remake based on the 1990 film of the same name. A group of medical students led by the afterlife-obsessed Courtney search for insights into what awaits them after death by stopping their hearts before being revived again. While the rest of the group are encouraged by the new lease of life Courtney gains from her experience, they are soon subjected to terrifying visions from their past.(n)

programme.title: Ali and Nino
programme.desc: Romantic drama. The love story of Ali and Nino, a young couple, residing in the troubled times of World War. Their relationship is tested when Ali fights with the Bolsheviks, while Nino nurses wounded soldiers during the March Days massacre.(n)

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Modern twist on Beatrix Potter's classic creation. Peter Rabbit and his sisters enjoy troubling Mr McGregor by raiding his vegetable garden. After the death of Mr McGregor, his relative moves in the house and is shocked to meet the unwanted guests. What follows is the battle of wills between the new house owner and the rabbits.(n)

programme.title: Slaughterhouse Rulez
programme.desc: Horror comedy, set at a prestigious boarding school, which comes under attack from blood-hungry creatures. While new student Finn struggles to fit in with his classmates, his stay at the exclusive establishment becomes even more testing when the headmaster allows a fracking company to drill within the school grounds - a move which inadvertently disturbs a gang of murderous monsters.(n)

programme.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: Action-adventure about four misfit classmates who are thrown into a dangerous adventure together after unearthing an old gaming console. Told to serve detention in their school's basement, the group happens across the video game Jumanji and prepares to play. Unaware to them however, the start button transports them into the title's jungle setting - turning the students into the game's characters and forcing them to get through the levels in one piece if they want to escape.(n)

programme.title: Same Kind of Different As Me
programme.desc: Drama. When art dealer Ron admits he is having an affair, his wife does not throw him out but orders him to do voluntary work, where he makes a special friend while serving the homeless.(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure. Newt Scamander is reunited with his old friends from America when Albus Dumbledore asks him to take down the dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald, who has escaped captivity in the second instalment of the Fantastic Beasts series written by JK Rowling.(n)

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Modern twist on Beatrix Potter's classic creation. Peter Rabbit and his sisters enjoy troubling Mr McGregor by raiding his vegetable garden. After the death of Mr McGregor, his relative moves in the house and is shocked to meet the unwanted guests. What follows is the battle of wills between the new house owner and the rabbits.(n)

programme.title: Searching
programme.desc: Tense cyber thriller about a widower's desparate search for his missing daughter. Suspecting the worst after his 16-year-old fails to return home from her study group, the father watches on in frustration as the police fail to uncover any leads. Taking matters into his own hands, he begins combing through the youngster's digital footprint in a bid to find any clues that may lead to her whereabouts.(n)

programme.title: Shoplifters
programme.desc: Crime drama. A family of impoverished grifters eke out a living through petty scams and shoplifting. But their lifestyle starts to unravel when they take in a seemingly abandoned girl from an abusive home and draw her into their life of crime.(n)

programme.title: Lizzie
programme.desc: Thriller based on the infamous 1892 Borden family murders. Financially trapped in the home of her domineering and brutal father, Lizzie Borden forms an intimate friendship with a new maid. When she finds her father plans to leave everything to her stepmother, Lizzie and her lover plot drastic action to pre-empt the bequest.(n)

programme.title: Fast & Furious - Hobbs & Shaw: Special
programme.desc: Sky Cinema delves into the hotly-anticipated action-packed spin off starring Dwayne Johnson, Jason Statham and Idris Elba.(n)

programme.title: Age of Summer
programme.desc: Charming comedy. After relocating with his family, a teenage boy navigates challenges and new relationships as he tries to fit in with the cool kids in the summer of '86.(n)

programme.title: Nobody's Fool
programme.desc: Romantic comedy. Freshly released from prison, an ex-con suspects her high-flying sister is being catfished by an online suitor who may not be all he seems.(n)

programme.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
programme.desc: Award-winning animated superhero adventure about teenager Nick Morales, who attempts to balance his hectic life with the demands of becoming the new Spider-Man. Weighed down by pressure as he is expected to continue Peter Parker's legacy, a portal to the multiverse brings Morales face to face with his predecessor - and a range of other heroes - as they attempt to bring down the evil Wilson Fisk.(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure. Newt Scamander is reunited with his old friends from America when Albus Dumbledore asks him to take down the dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald, who has escaped captivity in the second instalment of the Fantastic Beasts series written by JK Rowling.(n)

programme.title: Marriage Material
programme.desc: Romantic comedy. A man is forced to reconsider his values when his fiancee gives him a list of suggested improvements to make him a perfect husband. He reluctantly ropes in friends to help him change, but will it really be for the better?(n)

programme.title: Lizzie

programme.title: Nobody's Fool
programme.desc: Romantic comedy. Freshly released from prison, an ex-con suspects her high-flying sister is being catfished by an online suitor who may not be all he seems.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.(n)

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: Action adventure about an expedition that sets out to find a rare diamond and encounters a sinister lost city in the Congo. An executive sent to locate a blue diamond vital to a business project finds herself in the company of a Romanian fortune hunter and a primatologist. After a perilous journey, they discover the mines that hold the legendary King Solomon's diamonds, but they are closely guarded by savage gorillas.(n)

programme.title: Edward Scissorhands
programme.desc: Poignant, keenly satirical fantasy about a boy with sharp metal shears for hands, who is the creation of an inventor who dies before finishing his work. The boy's years of isolation in an incongruous Gothic castle are ended when a kindly Avon lady takes him into her home in the pastel-coloured suburbs below. His innocence and kindness quickly endear him to the neighbours, but their acceptance of Edward's difference is short-lived. The film marks director Tim Burton's first collaboration with star, Johnny Depp.(n)

programme.title: Shrek Forever After
programme.desc: Animated family adventure. A domesticated Shrek becomes depressed when he believes no one finds him frightening anymore. He makes a deal to get his roar back with an embittered Rumpelstiltskin, who is out to get revenge on the ogre. Shrek finds himself in an alternate reality where he was never born and faces a race to break the spell and rescue Fiona.(n)

programme.title: Last Holiday
programme.desc: Comedy drama about a shy New Orleans shop clerk who, on discovering that she is terminally ill and could be dead within weeks, cashes in her life savings and heads to Europe to see out her days in the lap of luxury and free of the social restraints that have led to her reserved outlook on life.(n)

programme.title: Max Steel
programme.desc: Action-adventure. A teenager, Max, and his alien companion, Steel, harness their powers to evolve into a mighty superhero, Max Steel.(n)

programme.title: American Ultra
programme.desc: A hapless stoner has his life turned upside down when he is revealed to be a deadly sleeper agent in this anarchic action comedy. Store clerk Mike Howell suffers panic attacks whenever he tries to leave the backwoods hometown he's shacked up in with his live-in girlfriend Phoebe. What he doesn't realise is that he is a sleeper government agent with unrivalled martial arts skills just waiting to be activated.(n)

programme.title: World War Z
programme.desc: Apocalypse epic. When the traffic jam retired UN advisor Gerry Lane is sitting in is overrun by military, it quickly becomes clear they are under attack from zombies. Scrambling to get his wife and children to safety, Gerry makes it to New Jersey, where they are taken to an offshore safe zone. There Gerry learns that a global pandemic of zombies has wiped out billions of lives and that, in exchange for the ongoing protection of his family, he must travel to Asia to find the source of the virus.(n)

programme.title: Kill Bill Vol 2
programme.desc: Quentin Tarantino's stylish, violent samurai sequel in which the vengeful assassin, The Bride, concludes her ruthless quest for revenge. Before she can get to her ultimate nemesis and former mentor, however, two more of the Deadly Viper Assassination Squad stand in the way.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.(n)

There Gerry learns that a global pandemic of zombies has wiped out billions of lives and that, in exchange for the ongoing protection of his family, he must travel to Asia to find the source of the virus.(n)

programme.title: Jackie Chan's First Strike
programme.desc: High-energy martial arts movie about a Hong Kong detective contracted to recover a stolen nuclear warhead. Hired by both the CIA and Russian intelligence, the kung fu cop is harassed, assaulted and framed for murder as he delves into the murky world of international arms dealing, where millions are at stake and the heavies are free to dip into their own supplies.(n)

programme.title: Frontier Gal
programme.desc: Comedy western in which a saloon proprietress and an outlaw marry, have a baby, fight like wildcats, and are subsequently reunited by their child.(n)

programme.title: Off Set: Ben Miller
programme.desc: Actor and comedian Ben Miller discusses his career.(n)

programme.title: Hollywood's Best Film Directors
programme.desc: In-depth interviews with Hollywood's best film directors. Academy Award-winning filmmaker Ron Howard discusses his greatest achievements and most memorable onset experiences.(n)

programme.title: Close Up
programme.desc: The story, the glamour, the cinematography and the gossip of Hollywood.(n)

programme.title: Close Up
programme.desc: The story, the glamour, the cinematography and the gossip of Hollywood.(n)

programme.title: Close Up
programme.desc: The story, the glamour, the cinematography and the gossip of Hollywood.(n)

programme.title: Off Set: Jamie Cullum
programme.desc: Jazz maestro Jamie Cullum talks about film noir and The Maltese Falcon.(n)

programme.title: Private's Progress
programme.desc: Lighthearted comedy about an upper-crust chap who joins the army and has problems coping with the regimented lifestyle. He soon becomes known as a misfit, only to find a little salvation in the form of his uncle, who has been looting German art treasures from behind enemy lines.(n)

programme.title: Virginia City
programme.desc: Civil War western, loosely based on a true incident. Errol Flynn, as a maverick Northern officer, escapes from the clutches of the Confederates in an attempt to stymie a plot by Southern sympathisers in the North to ship gold bullion in aid of the Confederacy's beleaguered economy.(n)

programme.title: Apache War Smoke
programme.desc: Legendary bandito Peso, pursued by angry Apaches who accuse him of killing some of their braves, goes into hiding at the way station run by his son, Tom Herrera. There is no love lost between the pair, but when the Apaches arrive, Tom refuses to hand his father over, and the occupants of the station await the expected siege.(n)

programme.title: The Day of the Jackal
programme.desc: Fast-paced thriller based on Frederick Forsyth's best-selling novel about a professional hit man hired by the OAS to assassinate President Charles de Gaulle. When the plot is discovered, a Paris detective is faced with a desperate race to stop him.(n)

programme.title: The Secret War of Harry Frigg
programme.desc: Five Allied officers are captured in Tunisia during WW II and are incarcerated in a comfortable Italian mansion. A private, who has a knack at escaping from prison camps, is promoted to major general and given the task of helping the officers to escape. His valiant attempts are temporarily thwarted, however, by his desires for the mansion owner and the luxury in which the soldiers find themslves.(n)

programme.title: Double Indemnity
programme.desc: Taut film noir about an insurance salesman who is coerced into murder by an alluring femme fatale. The story unfolds in flashback, told by the salesman as he sits slumped in a chair, bleeding heavily from a bullet wound. After being seduced by a vampish client, he fraudulently writes a double-indemnity accidental-death policy on her husband. Then, bit by bit, she puts her evil scheme into action.(n)

programme.title: Payback
programme.desc: Tough action thriller in which a man is persuaded by an old friend to take part in a heist of laundered Triad drug money. But the friend and the man's wife have carefully planned the whole caper in order to double-cross him, and leave him for dead. However, he survives and when he realises what they have done, he sets out to exact his revenge.(n)

programme.title: Night of the Living Dead
programme.desc: Low-budget horror classic in which radiation from a space probe reanimates the dead, who become ravenous for the flesh of the living. A small band of survivors barricade themselves inside an isolated farmhouse as zombies gather outside. An extremely influential horror film, director George A Romero's low-budget masterpiece spawned two sequels, a 1990 remake, and numerous imitators.(n)

programme.title: Jackie Chan's First Strike

There is no love lost between the pair, but when the Apaches arrive, Tom refuses to hand his father over, and the occupants of the station await the expected siege.(n)

programme.title: The Day of the Jackal
programme.desc: Fast-paced thriller based on Frederick Forsyth's best-selling novel about a professional hit man hired by the OAS to assassinate President Charles de Gaulle. When the plot is discovered, a Paris detective is faced with a desperate race to stop him.(n)

programme.title: The Secret War of Harry Frigg
programme.desc: Five Allied officers are captured in Tunisia during WW II and are incarcerated in a comfortable Italian mansion. A private, who has a knack at escaping from prison camps, is promoted to major general and given the task of helping the officers to escape. His valiant attempts are temporarily thwarted, however, by his desires for the mansion owner and the luxury in which the soldiers find themslves.(n)

programme.title: Double Indemnity
programme.desc: Taut film noir about an insurance salesman who is coerced into murder by an alluring femme fatale. The story unfolds in flashback, told by the salesman as he sits slumped in a chair, bleeding heavily from a bullet wound. After being seduced by a vampish client, he fraudulently writes a double-indemnity accidental-death policy on her husband. Then, bit by bit, she puts her evil scheme into action.(n)

programme.title: Payback
programme.desc: Tough action thriller in which a man is persuaded by an old friend to take part in a heist of laundered Triad drug money. But the friend and the man's wife have carefully planned the whole caper in order to double-cross him, and leave him for dead. However, he survives and when he realises what they have done, he sets out to exact his revenge.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Classic family drama series. When a 19-year-old wandering minstrel appears on Walton's Mountain, Mary Ellen abandons her family just as she is needed most.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Actress Alvira Drummond, stranded on Waltons Mountain after her car and chauffeur fail her, grudgingly accepts the family's hospitality.(n)

programme.title: The Man from UNCLE
programme.desc: Agents Napoleon Solo and Illya Kuryakin team up to fight crime as part of the United Network Command for Law and Enforcement. The agents fall prey to madman Jacques Robespierre, who is convinced that wine will lead to France's downfall and is plotting to destroy all the vineyards of France.(n)

programme.title: The Man from UNCLE
programme.desc: Agents Napoleon Solo and Illya Kuryakin team up to fight crime as part of the United Network Command for Law and Enforcement. A top-secret UNCLE conference is threatened by THRUSH's secret weapon, a band of highly trained killer public schoolboys.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.sub-title: Close Encounters of a Heavenly Kind
programme.desc: Drama series. Jonathan and Mark offer encouragement to a young bullied orphan whose eccentric grandfather is in danger of losing him to a heartless social worker.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Drama series. Mark begins working for a beautiful movie star with a very low opinion of men. They each 'wish to God' they could trade places, so God grants their wishes.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: American drama series. The Walton family prepares for John Boy's homecoming, but his recovery from the plane crash is far from complete.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: American drama series. Romance comes to Walton's Mountain for Mary-Ellen and Corabeth.(n)

programme.title: At the Midnight Hour
programme.desc: Contemporary murder mystery about a young nanny who tries to unite a troubled child with his widowed father by unravelling the mystery that surrounds the mother's death.(n)

programme.title: Life Is Not a Fairytale
programme.desc: Drama based on the true story of American Idol winner Fantasia, a teenage single mother who overcame poverty, sexual abuse and illiteracy to win the televised singing competition.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Drama series about a helping angel. Trying to stop the senseless massacre of wild horses, Jonathan and Mark are aided by the grandson of a ranch owner who feels defeated by old age and too tired to help himself.(n)

programme.title: Highway to Heaven
programme.desc: Drama series about an angel on probation. Jonathan and Mark, acting as police drug counsellors, face resistance from staff and students when they try to rid a high school of narcotics.(n)

programme.title: North and South
programme.desc: General George Hazard is captured and imprisoned in a brutal jail, while General Orry Main is being tended by Hazard's sister in a Northern hospital.(n)

programme.title: Blue Smoke
programme.desc: Romantic thriller based on a novel by Nora Roberts. After watching a fire burn her family's Baltimore pizzeria to the ground, a girl realises her ambition to become an arson investigator when she grows up. Years later, she buys a house in her old neighbourhood and embarks on a relationship with her neighbour, only to find that the arsonist from her past has begun to stalk her and her loved ones again.(n)

programme.title: The Trip to Bountiful
programme.desc: Carrie Watts escapes from the confines of her home she shares with her busy, overprotective son, Ludie, and pretentious daughter-in-law, Jessie Mae and heads to the local bus station, where she befriends Thelma, a young woman travelling to Carrie's hometown of Bountiful. When Ludie and Jessie Mae discover she is gone, they call in law enforcement to help, but Carrie is one step ahead of them and convinces the local sheriff to help her on her journey home.(n)

programme.title: Seventeen and Missing
programme.desc: Mystic chiller. A psychic receives a series of visions when her teen daughter disappears in mysterious circumstances. Enlisting her estranged husband to help find her, she draws on all her powers, which tell her that her daughter was abducted. A series of clairvoyant clues eventually lead to where she's being held. But will she find her daughter alive?(n)

programme.title: Hazing Secret
programme.desc: Twisted thriller. When an amnesiac, who has the same dream about the death of a sorority sister, is invited to a reunion, she realises it was not just a dream.(n)

programme.title: The Dictator
programme.desc: Comedy about an eccentric North African ruler. The Republic of Wadiya's oppressive, anti-western leader is summoned to a UN assembly in New York to respond to concerns about his country's nuclear weapons program.(n)

programme.title: My Cousin Vinny
programme.desc: Courtroom farce about a brash Brooklyn lawyer who has barely qualified before he finds himself called south to defend a cousin who is charged with murder. His ignorance of courtroom protocol and unfamiliarity with the Deep South conspire to place him at a distinct disadvantage, a shame for his luckless relative, who is in fact innocent. Oscar-winning Marisa Tomei is Vinny's lively girlfriend.(n)

programme.title: The Top Ten Show 2019
programme.desc: A look at the biggest films in the UK and US charts, featuring clips of the best movies on offer at the cinema.(n)

programme.title: Blue Streak
programme.desc: Action comedy about a jewel thief who hides his swag on a building site before being arrested. When he gets out of jail, he finds the site is now a police station. His only hope is to pose as a cop to rescue his stash - and, of course, chaos ensues.(n)

programme.title: In and Out
programme.desc: Engaging comedy in which a small-town schoolteacher is `outed' at the Academy Awards by an ex-student who has won an Oscar. He denies the claim to his fiance, friends and family - and to the journalists who have latched on to the story - but they remain unconvinced, especially when they consider his tidiness and love of Barbra Streisand. Eventually, he is forced to question his sexuality.(n)

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Slapstick, special-effects-filled comedy about a shy, overweight professor who invents a slimming potion in order to make himself more attractive to women. The brew transforms him into a super-fit stud, but the effect is only temporary and wears off at the most inopportune moments. A remake of the 1963 Jerry Lewis vehicle.(n)

programme.title: Think Like a Man Too
programme.desc: Comedy sequel which sees the four couples return to celebrate Candace's wedding in Las Vegas. A miscommunication leads to Cedric believing that he has been given the title of best man, and he plans a wild batchelor party. Not to be outdone, the girls try to show that they can match the guys' brash flamboyance, and also put on an extravagant celebration. But the two groups soon realise that the battle of the sexes is not the biggest of their worries, when events threaten to derail the ceremony.(n)

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Exuberant musical based on the hit stage show featuring the music of ABBA. 20-year-old Sophie lives on an idyllic Greek island with her free-spirited mother Donna. When Sophie gets engaged to her boyfriend, she decides that she wants her father at her wedding - but unfortunately, she does not know who her father is. She takes matters into her own hands and invites the three possible candidates to the wedding, without the knowledge of her mother. Will Donna reveal who Sophie's real dad is? And is she as reluctant to see her former lovers as she claims?(n)

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: Feelgood musical sequel following Sophie as she prepares for the grand opening of her own hotel on the Greek island of Kalokairi. Having named the venture in her mother's honour after her passing a year earlier, Sophie must be brave as she attempts to follow in Donna's footsteps. Meanwhile, a young Donna embarks on a whirlwind adventure in the late 1970s as she meets Sophie's three possible dads for the first time.(n)

programme.title: Step Brothers
programme.desc: Comedy. Two spoilt middle-aged men who still live at home become stepbrothers when their parents marry. Forced to share a bedroom and look for jobs together, the pair eventually forge a friendship. But can the family's domestic situation ever be harmonious?(n)

programme.title: Action Point
programme.desc: Comedy. Expect spills and thrills along with the laughs as Johnny 'Jackass' Knoxville stars in this raucous comedy about a daredevil and his pals who design and build their own theme park.(n)

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Exuberant musical based on the hit stage show featuring the music of ABBA. 20-year-old Sophie lives on an idyllic Greek island with her free-spirited mother Donna. When Sophie gets engaged to her boyfriend, she decides that she wants her father at her wedding - but unfortunately, she does not know who her father is. She takes matters into her own hands and invites the three possible candidates to the wedding, without the knowledge of her mother. Will Donna reveal who Sophie's real dad is? And is she as reluctant to see her former lovers as she claims?(n)

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: Feelgood musical sequel following Sophie as she prepares for the grand opening of her own hotel on the Greek island of Kalokairi. Having named the venture in her mother's honour after her passing a year earlier, Sophie must be brave as she attempts to follow in Donna's footsteps. Meanwhile, a young Donna embarks on a whirlwind adventure in the late 1970s as she meets Sophie's three possible dads for the first time.(n)

programme.title: Talladega Nights: The Ballad of Ricky Bobby
programme.desc: Motor racing comedy about a champion NASCAR driver whose cosy position alongside his best friend at the top of the championship is threatened by a flamboyant French newcomer. With his confidence shattered, the driver draws on the help of his father and some eccentric training techniques to claw his way back to the top.(n)

programme.title: 12 Rounds
programme.desc: Action thriller. A New Orleans detective must complete 12 perilous challenges devised by a criminal mastermind in order to secure the safe release of his kidnapped girlfriend.(n)

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: Gritty, action-packed reworking of the classic tale. After clashing with a Norman knight in an effort to save the life of a poacher, a Saxon noble is stripped of his title and land. Branded an outlaw, he flees to the forest, where he assembles an army strong enough to bring about the downfall of Prince John.(n)

programme.title: Fast & Furious - Hobbs & Shaw: Special
programme.desc: Sky Cinema delves into the hotly-anticipated action-packed spin off starring Dwayne Johnson, Jason Statham and Idris Elba.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
programme.desc: Fantasy. The eighth instalment of Star Wars follows the journey of Rey, who is helped by Luke Skywalker to develop her powers. She tries to persuade Luke to save the galaxy once more as the Resistance prepares the fight against the First Order.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace
programme.desc: Special effects-laden prequel to the 1977 classic Star Wars. When the evil Trade Federation - headed by Darth Sidious and his powerful henchman Darth Maul - plots to take over the peaceful planet of Naboo, Jedi Knight Qui-Gon Jinn and his apprentice Obi-Wan Kenobi embark on a mission to save the planet. Fans of the trilogy will be particularly interested to discover the origins of Darth Vader.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode II - Attack of the Clones
programme.desc: The second prequel to the classic Star Wars trilogy follows the fortunes of Jedi Knight Obi-Wan Kenobi and his headstrong apprentice Anakin Skywalker, who have been charged with protecting Queen Amidala from a mysterious assassin. Rival factions vie for supremacy as Anakin's feelings for Amidala grow.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: The Clone Wars
programme.desc: Animated continuation of the Star Wars saga. With peace in the galaxy shattered by the onset of the Clone Wars, Obi-Wan Kenobi and Yoda lead the massed clone ranks into battle against the forces of the dark side. Meanwhile, heroic Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker and his Padawan apprentice take on Count Dooku and his nefarious henchmen.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
programme.desc: The final prequel in the Star Wars saga sees young Jedi Anakin Skywalker increasingly lured to the dark side of the Force. With war raging and the Galactic Republic corrupted by an evil Sith Lord, Anakin must turn his back on his friend and mentor Obi-Wan Kenobi in order to try and save his new wife Padme, a course of action that will lead him to become Darth Vader.(n)

programme.title: Solo: A Star Wars Story
programme.desc: Sci-fi blockbuster. On a daring adventure through the criminal underworld, Han Solo befriends his future co-pilot Chewbacca - forming a bond that will shape the fate of the galaxy.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars
programme.desc: Sci-fi classic in which a simple farmboy is told that he is the last of the Jedi, a race of noble warriors protected by the mysterious `Force', and is sent on a mission to protect the universe from the evil Empire and rescue a beautiful princess. Luke Skywalker is aided on his mission by two robots, a hairy `wookie' and a maverick space pilot, Han Solo. His quest will bring him face to face with the evil Lord Darth Vader.(n)

programme.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
programme.desc: Following an Imperial attack on a rebel base, Luke Skywalker undergoes Jedi training from the mystic master Yoda. But he is forced to cut his apprenticeship short when Han Solo and Leia are double-crossed and delivered into the menacing clutches of Darth Vader, who has an almighty revelation in store for young Skywalker.(n)

programme.title: Nanny McPhee
programme.desc: A widowed father cannot manage his seven children whose monumentally bad behaviour has driven away 17 nannies to date. Enter the mysterious and somewhat scary Nanny McPhee who uses magic to win the children over. Emma Thompson, who stars, also wrote the screenplay, based on the Nurse Matilda books by Christianna Brand.(n)

programme.title: The Cat in the Hat
programme.desc: Humorous adaptation of the classic Dr Seuss children's book, in which two housebound children are visited by a cat who saves them from their rainy-day boredom by bringing mayhem to their house.(n)

programme.title: Ploey: You Never Fly Alone
programme.desc: Animation. A plover chick who has yet to learn how to fly gets left behind when his family migrates south from Iceland in the autumn. Now he must learn to fend for himself in the Arctic winter, trying to keep warm, find food and evade predators if he is to survive until the spring.(n)

programme.title: The Smurfs 2
programme.desc: A second dose of Smurfing fun with this madcap mixture of live action and animation. Evil wizard Gargamel desperately wants the Smurfs' powerful magical essence to turn his own mischievous Smurf-a-likes into bona fide Smurfs. Needing one of the little blue creatures in his grasp to do so, Gargamel kidnaps Smurfette and takes her to Paris. Can Gargamel's Naughties sway her to the dark side?(n)

programme.title: Smallfoot
programme.desc: Animated family film. An epic journey ensues when a Yeti named Migo stumbles across a real human being and is banished from his snowy home when no-one believes him.(n)

programme.title: Lego Scooby-Doo!: Haunted Hollywood
programme.desc: Children's animated movie. The old movie studio faces a double threat from developers as well as a gang of movie monsters. Scooby and the gang come to the rescue.(n)

programme.title: Teen Titans Go! To the Movies
programme.desc: Animated superhero comedy. The Teen Titans want to star in their own movie and head to Tinsel Town with hopes of being noticed by a popular Hollywood film director. However, things go awry when a villain's maniacal plan for world domination sidetracks their dream of stardom.(n)

programme.title: The Smurfs 2
programme.desc: A second dose of Smurfing fun with this madcap mixture of live action and animation. Evil wizard Gargamel desperately wants the Smurfs' powerful magical essence to turn his own mischievous Smurf-a-likes into bona fide Smurfs. Needing one of the little blue creatures in his grasp to do so, Gargamel kidnaps Smurfette and takes her to Paris. Can Gargamel's Naughties sway her to the dark side?(n)

programme.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader
programme.desc: Children's fantasy sequel. The Pevensie siblings and their cousin Eustace return to Narnia as they embark upon a perilous sea quest with Prince Caspian. The trio encounter slave traders, lost lords and sea serpents as they attempt to defeat the evil mist by presenting Aslan with seven swords and saving the magical realm in the process.(n)

programme.title: Smallfoot
programme.desc: Animated family film. An epic journey ensues when a Yeti named Migo stumbles across a real human being and is banished from his snowy home when no-one believes him.(n)
