programme.title: Charlotte's Web
programme.desc: Children's animal adventure. A spider hatches a plan to save her piglet best friend from being taken away to an abattoir to be slaughtered. Adapted from the much-loved book by EB White.(n)

programme.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Voyage of the Dawn Treader
programme.desc: Children's fantasy sequel. The Pevensie siblings and their cousin Eustace return to Narnia as they embark upon a perilous sea quest with Prince Caspian. The trio encounter slave traders, lost lords and sea serpents as they attempt to defeat the evil mist by presenting Aslan with seven swords and saving the magical realm in the process.(n)

programme.title: The Sandlot
programme.desc: Family comedy set in 1962 about a boy who smuggles his stepfather's heirloom baseball out of the house for a game with the neighbourhood kids, only to knock it into a yard guarded by a terrifying dog. Panic-stricken, the youngsters come up with increasingly improbable ball-retrieving devices in a bid to make good before they are found out.(n)

programme.title: Perfect Skin
programme.desc: Psychological horror about a woman who draws the attention of a tattoo artist with dark desires. While she is initially intrigued by the tattooist's mysterious nature, her curiosity soon leads to a terrifying turn of events as she is abducted - with the kidnapper using her body as a canvas against her will.(n)

programme.title: Slumber
programme.desc: Horror about a doctor who is forced to question everything she thought she knew as she treats a family whose dreams are plagued by a mysterious force.(n)

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview - August 2019
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema and other highlights showing on Sky.(n)

programme.title: The Matrix Reloaded
programme.desc: Sci-fi sequel. With the machines digging into the underground rebel city of Zion, Neo and Morpheus return to the Matrix to cut off their enemies' power supply. Part two of the trilogy has even more incredible effects and an amazing motorway action sequence.(n)

programme.title: The Matrix Revolutions
programme.desc: Final part of the trilogy that sees Neo, Morpheus and Trinity battling to save Zion from the onslaught of the machines. Neo finds himself trapped in a train station between the Matrix and the real world and must escape to stop Smith from taking over and destroying everything. He must fulfil his destiny and the Oracle's assertion that everything that has a beginning has an end.(n)

programme.title: The Meg
programme.desc: Action horror. After abandoning his crew and raving about a giant shark, navy diver Jonas Taylor loses his family and career. Five years later, his ex-wife is among a team trapped on a sunken sub, at the mercy of the 70-foot beast.(n)

programme.title: Venom
programme.desc: Marvel superhero adventure about the life of journalist Eddie Brock and his alien alter ego Venom. Investigating the true motives of a corporation running unusual experiments, Brock finds himself overrun by an alien symbiote and is rendered powerless to stop the creature's actions when he becomes the host body for the extraterrestrial.(n)

programme.title: Thor: Ragnarok
programme.desc: Marvel superhero sequel. Faced with the destruction of Asgard and a battle against a former ally, Thor races against time to stop a powerful enemy.(n)

programme.title: The Sixth Sense
programme.desc: Thriller about an eight-year-old boy with a dark secret - he sees ghosts. One day he blurts out the truth to a psychologist who tries to help him and discover what is behind the disturbances.(n)

programme.title: The Meg
programme.desc: Action horror. After abandoning his crew and raving about a giant shark, navy diver Jonas Taylor loses his family and career. Five years later, his ex-wife is among a team trapped on a sunken sub, at the mercy of the 70-foot beast.(n)

programme.title: Thor: Ragnarok
programme.desc: Marvel superhero sequel. Faced with the destruction of Asgard and a battle against a former ally, Thor races against time to stop a powerful enemy.(n)

programme.title: Basil, the Great Mouse Detective
programme.desc: Disney animation in which Basil, a Holmes-like mouse detective, faces his greatest challenge when he tries to prevent the evil Professor Ratigan from taking over the world. Featuring the voices of Vincent Price and Barrie Ingham.(n)

programme.title: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure. After his father, the king of Persia, is killed, Prince Dastan discovers the secret of a magic dagger which can rewind time. He must then protect it from a villain who intends to make himself king by rewriting the past, and also to avert the end of the world which could occur if the dagger is misused.(n)

programme.title: Cinderella 2: Dreams Come True
programme.desc: Disney sequel to the original, telling the story of Cinderella's life after she married Prince Charming. Three tales tell how she tries to fit into palace life, what happens when her little mouse friend is granted his wish to become human, and how she teaches her stepsister to smile and find true love.(n)

programme.title: Stitch! The Movie
programme.desc: Animated film about the loveable alien. Stitch is happy as a member of Lilo's extended family, and has settled in on Earth. But Dr Jumba has smuggled 625 of his first alien experiments to Earth, and now the evil Captain Gantu wants them back. Can Stitch and his new friends save the experiments?(n)

programme.title: Planes 2: Fire & Rescue
programme.desc: In this animated adventure from Disney, Dusty Crophopper's faulty gearbox causes a fire that closes down Propwash Junction's airport. Determined to make amends, Dusty heads off to Piston Peak National Park to undergo training as an aerial firefighter. However, he struggles to impress helicopter mentor Blade Ranger - until he is called upon to rescue two campers from a raging forest fire.(n)

programme.title: Bolt
programme.desc: Animated adventure. Bolt is the cute superhero dog star of a fictional TV programme, who does not realise he is part of a show and believes his powers are real. When he mistakenly believes his human co-star is in danger, he embarks on a trek across America to save her life.(n)

programme.title: Princess Diaries 2: Royal Engagement
programme.desc: Romantic comedy sequel. Princess Mia returns to Genovia after graduating, hoping to take over from her grandmother, Queen Clarisse, and rule Genovia fairly. However, evil Viscount Mabrey has other ideas and wants to install his nephew Nicholas on the throne.(n)

programme.title: One Hundred and One Dalmatians
programme.desc: Disney's animated classic about the theft of a litter of Dalmatian puppies by the flamboyant Cruella De Vil, who secretly plans to make a coat from their skins. Working against the clock, London's dogs pull together to mount a rescue operation. The film took three years to make, and the state-of-the-art animation cost an astronomical four million dollars.(n)

programme.title: Planes 2: Fire & Rescue
programme.desc: In this animated adventure from Disney, Dusty Crophopper's faulty gearbox causes a fire that closes down Propwash Junction's airport. Determined to make amends, Dusty heads off to Piston Peak National Park to undergo training as an aerial firefighter. However, he struggles to impress helicopter mentor Blade Ranger - until he is called upon to rescue two campers from a raging forest fire.(n)

programme.title: Mary Poppins
programme.desc: Disney's musical fantasy, combining live action with animation, about a highly unorthodox nanny who takes a job with a family in London. Jane and Michael's father thinks they need a strict disciplinarian, while the children have other ideas - but nothing can prepare any of them for the Mary Poppins approach to life.(n)

programme.title: Wall-E
programme.desc: Computer-animated science fiction adventure. A robot designed to clean up a waste-covered Earth far in the future, falls in love with another robot and follows her into outer space on an adventure that changes the destiny of both his kind and humanity. With the voices of Ben Burtt, Elissa Knight and Sigourney Weaver.(n)

programme.title: Princess Diaries 2: Royal Engagement
programme.desc: Romantic comedy sequel. Princess Mia returns to Genovia after graduating, hoping to take over from her grandmother, Queen Clarisse, and rule Genovia fairly. However, evil Viscount Mabrey has other ideas and wants to install his nephew Nicholas on the throne.(n)

programme.title: Mary Poppins
programme.desc: Disney's musical fantasy, combining live action with animation, about a highly unorthodox nanny who takes a job with a family in London. Jane and Michael's father thinks they need a strict disciplinarian, while the children have other ideas - but nothing can prepare any of them for the Mary Poppins approach to life.(n)

programme.title: The Warriors
programme.desc: A tough, nine-man gang from Coney Island, New York, must make their way home through the unfamiliar territory of rival gangs after being framed for the murder of a powerful hoodlum.(n)

programme.title: Apostasy
programme.desc: BAFTA-nominated drama following a family of devout Jehovah's Witnesses, sisters Alex and Luisa and mother Ivanna, who suffer from a crisis of faith.(n)

programme.title: The Elephant and the Butterfly
programme.desc: Family melodrama. A tale of one man and a little lady as a love rat returns to confront his past, but arrives just as the woman he jilted five years earlier is heading off on an important business trip. Flustered because the babysitter has not arrived, she asks him to stay with her daughter for a few minutes. He agrees, but the babysitter never arrives.(n)

programme.title: Casablanca
programme.desc: Romantic wartime drama. As World War II rages in Europe, a laconic American nightclub owner living in Morocco finds his life turned upside down when the woman he once loved reappears in his life with a husband who is on the run from the Nazis. As passion reignites between the former lovers, the expatriate must decide whether to flee with his beloved or to send her away with her new love, who is of vital importance to the Allied war effort. Considered to be one of the all-time Hollywood greats, Michael Curtiz's Oscar winning film features a screenplay that combines romance, adventure, comedy and intrigue, alongside the classic tune, As Time Goes By.(n)

programme.title: Patti Cake$
programme.desc: Drama about an aspiring rapper who chases fame and fortune as she attempts to make waves in the world of music. White, female and overweight, Patricia - stage name Patti Cake$ - must contend with the putdowns of those who viciously attack her appearance and tell her that her dream is impossible, while also dealing with menial jobs and her heavy-drinking mother. With hip-hop loving friend Jheri on her side, however, will Patricia be able to silence her critics?(n)

programme.title: Wonder Wheel
programme.desc: Drama about a former actress whose life is upturned by the appearance of her husband's estranged daughter.(n)

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: Star-studded WWII classic, inspired by real characters and events. In the supposedly escape-proof Stalag Luft III, the Allied escape committee devise a daring plan to liberate hundreds of Allied POWs into occupied territory. Hiding civilian clothing, forged documents and three tunnels from the German guards is difficult enough, but the prisoners also have to dispose of tons of soil. The film is notable for Steve McQueen's leap over barbed wire on a motorcycle while being pursued by Nazi troops.(n)

programme.title: Downsizing
programme.desc: Social satire comedy. Genial occupational therapist Paul Safranek and his wife sign up for an experimental process of miniaturization. Their new small stature allows them to live it large, in a tiny community of grand houses, and saving the planet by consuming a fraction of the world's resources.(n)

programme.title: Thoroughbreds
programme.desc: Dark comedy thriller about two teenage girls who hatch an extreme plan to solve their problems. Emotionless and scarred by her troubled past, Amanda reunites with the popular and clever Lily - the best friend she has drifted away from over the years. Rekindling their bond under unusual circumstances, Amanda sets out to discover what is amiss in Lily's seemingly perfect life, and soon makes an outrageous suggestion to put everything right.(n)

programme.title: Gravity
programme.desc: Tense space thriller. When debris destroys their shuttle, a veteran astronaut and a medical engineer are helplessly catapulted into the isolated and unforgiving expanse of space, with oxygen - and their chance of survival - running out fast.(n)

programme.title: The Social Network
programme.desc: Drama chronicling the creation of the social-networking website Facebook in 2003 and the subsequent fallout between the key players involved. Harvard university student Mark Zuckerberg finds himself in legal hot water when he is accused of stealing the idea behind the hugely popular site.(n)

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: Violent comedy crime caper centred around three groups of villains intent on retrieving a missing diamond. Two friends team up with a pugilistic gypsy to fix a boxing match, but their opponent also arranges some dodgy betting with the courier of the stolen diamond, who subsequently goes missing. When a gangster from New York arrives on the scene, things really start to get complicated.(n)

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: Sci-fi thriller about a group of scientists who are working to achieve invisibility. Having had some success with animals, one of the team decides to test the serum on himself. However, the effects prove irreversible and the invisible man is driven insane, taking his wrath out on his ex-girlfriend and her new boyfriend.(n)

programme.title: To Sir, with Love
programme.desc: Classic drama about a black teacher who is assigned to a rough inner-city school, where he faces a class of rowdy, undisciplined working-class students. No stranger to hostility, he meets the challenge by treating them as young adults who will soon enter a world where they must make their own way. But when he is offered an engineering job, he must decide whether or not to stay in the teaching profession.(n)

programme.title: Escape from the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: Second sequel in the 'Apes' series. A trio of intelligent primates travel back to present-day Earth to escape the looming nuclear holocaust on their own planet. Crash-landing off the Californian coast and captured by the authorities, they are forced to reveal facts about the Earth's future that human society is unwilling to hear and desperate to alter.(n)

programme.title: An Officer and a Gentleman
programme.desc: Romantic drama set against the backdrop of a tough training school for American navy pilots. One of the new intake falls foul of the hard-as-nails drill sergeant but takes it on the chin and finds the additional strength to help a fellow student who is feeling the pressure. In their time off, the boys meet a couple of local factory girls, and the stories of their cadetships and romances unfold in parallel.(n)

programme.title: The World's End
programme.desc: Pegg, Frost and Wright reteam for the final serving in the Three Flavours Cornetto action comedy trilogy. Gary King, a man who refuses to grow up, reunites his reluctant friends to take a second crack at a legendary pub crawl from their teens. However, attempts to recapture their carefree youth are scuppered as old tensions resurface and the reunion threatens to fall apart. But then the outing takes a disastrous turn, when out of nowhere the fate of humanity falls into the gang's fumbling hands.(n)

programme.title: Kick-Ass
programme.desc: Action comedy about a self-made teenage superhero who teams up with a vengeful ex-cop and his deceptively sweet, hit girl daughter to fight the city's ruthless villains.(n)

programme.title: Kick-Ass 2
programme.desc: Superhero action comedy. Self-made superhero Kick-Ass and sweet-faced, foul-mouthed assassin Hit-Girl try to return to life as 'normal' teenagers, but soon they are faced with their deadliest challenge yet. To seek revenge for his father's death, Chris D'Amico has re-invented himself as the leader of an evil league of super-villains. To defeat their new nemesis, Kick-Ass and Hit-Girl must team up with a new wave of masked crusaders, led by the badass Colonel Stars and Stripes.(n)

programme.title: Closer
programme.desc: Steamy drama. A would-be novelist in a relationship with a free-spirited stripper falls for a photographer. After she spurns him, she begins a relationship with another man and, as the years pass, insecurities bubble to the surface in both relationships, sparking a four-way tug of love. Adapted from the play by Patrick Marber.(n)

programme.title: An Officer and a Gentleman
programme.desc: Romantic drama set against the backdrop of a tough training school for American navy pilots. One of the new intake falls foul of the hard-as-nails drill sergeant but takes it on the chin and finds the additional strength to help a fellow student who is feeling the pressure. In their time off, the boys meet a couple of local factory girls, and the stories of their cadetships and romances unfold in parallel.(n)

programme.title: The World's End
programme.desc: Pegg, Frost and Wright reteam for the final serving in the Three Flavours Cornetto action comedy trilogy. Gary King, a man who refuses to grow up, reunites his reluctant friends to take a second crack at a legendary pub crawl from their teens. However, attempts to recapture their carefree youth are scuppered as old tensions resurface and the reunion threatens to fall apart. But then the outing takes a disastrous turn, when out of nowhere the fate of humanity falls into the gang's fumbling hands.(n)

programme.title: Kick-Ass
programme.desc: Action comedy about a self-made teenage superhero who teams up with a vengeful ex-cop and his deceptively sweet, hit girl daughter to fight the city's ruthless villains.(n)

programme.title: Boys Don't Cry
programme.desc: Based on the true story of Brandon Teena, this acclaimed drama follows the trials of a teenage girl from Nebraska who reinvents herself as a man. She moves to the small-town community of Falls City and is accepted by a group of hard-drinking men as one of their own. However, when the transgender teen falls for a local girl and her real identity is discovered by the men she has befriended, their retribution for her deceit is swift. Hilary Swank received a Best Actress Oscar for her harrowing performance in the debut film of director, Kimberly Peirce.(n)

programme.title: The Bible
programme.desc: John Huston's ambitious attempt to re-tell the Biblical stories of Genesis, in a multi-national account covering the Creation to the story of Abraham and Isaac. Poet Christopher Fry adapted the first 22 chapters of Genesis.(n)

programme.title: The Music of Silence
programme.desc: Biopic based on the life of legendary Italian tenor Andrea Bocelli. Born with a serious eye condition that eventually leads to a total loss of sight, young Amos Bardi - an alter ego of Bocelli - must show resilience and determination as he rises from humble beginnings and pursues his desire to become a renowned musician.(n)

programme.title: Philadelphia
programme.desc: Drama featuring an Oscar-winning performance from Tom Hanks about a gay lawyer's fight against unlawful dismissal by his homophobic employer. Forced to lead a double life because of the bigoted views held by his law firm, he discovers he is HIV-positive during a routine medical examination and is soon afterwards is fired for incompetence. But the only man willing to take on his case is a sharp, unscrupulous lawyer.(n)

programme.title: Notorious
programme.desc: Biopic charting the life and death of hip hop star Notorious B.I.G, whose drive-by murder is still unsolved. A rags-to-riches tale from drugs and big dreams to the highlife of rap superstars with all the bling, champagne and entourage. Featuring concert scenes and depictions of major events and figures such as Tupac, Lil' Kim and Faith Evans.(n)

programme.title: Cocktail
programme.desc: Lively romantic drama about a handsome, materialistic young bartender who begins to reassess his priorities when he finds love. Working in an up-market Manhattan venue, he stages an elaborate cocktail-mixing act with a flashy, older colleague. When the pair fall out because of a woman, the deflated young man heads off to Jamaica where he encounters a beautiful waitress who makes him think again about his decision to swear off romance.(n)

programme.title: 28 Days
programme.desc: Emotional comedy drama about a hard-drinking New York journalist who takes her reputation as the life and soul of the party too far when she knocks over her sister's wedding cake and crashes the bridal limousine. A court orders her into rehab for a month, which she initially refuses to take seriously. However, when she meets others with substance abuse problems and talks to the counsellor, she gradually starts to change.(n)

programme.title: The Curious Case of Benjamin Button
programme.desc: Remarkable fantasy drama telling the story of a man who ages in reverse. Born with the appearance of a wrinkled old man in the last days of World War I, Benjamin Button's mother dies in childbirth and he is abandoned by his horrified father. Benjamin is taken in by a sympathetic couple, and as he advances in years he regresses physically and mentally, with bizarre consequences.(n)

programme.title: The Mountain Between Us
programme.desc: Drama about two strangers who must rely on each other to survive after a freak accident. Stuck at an airport thanks to bad weather, a neurosurgeon travelling to perform an operation and a bride on the verge of missing her own wedding day decide to charter a flight together to beat the storms. When the pilot has a stroke and the plane comes down in the mountains, however, it is left to the duo to look after each other and make it through injury, hunger and many other life-threatening challenges.(n)

programme.title: Fifty Shades Freed
programme.desc: Final instalment of the romantic drama based on the best-selling book series by EL James. Now married and adjusting to their domestic bliss, Christian and Ana find their honeymoon interrupted by the sinister plans of a shadowy face from the past out to disturb the happy union. Forced to spend her life looking over her shoulder, Ana soon finds herself stifled as she attempts to stay on top of work responsibilities and maintain her independence.(n)

programme.title: The Hurricane
programme.desc: Prison drama based on the true story of Rubin 'Hurricane' Carter, a young black boxer whose life was blighted by racism and whose career was curtailed by being unjustly imprisoned for murder. In prison, he struggles to hold on to his pride and writes an autobiography. When a African-American boy and his Canadian friends read the book, they become convinced of his innocence and are motivated to battle a racist establishment.(n)

programme.title: Con Air
programme.desc: High-octane blockbuster set aboard a federal aeroplane transporting convicts to a maximum security facility. One man on board, due for release on parole after eight years in prison, little realises that this flight home will turn into a disaster when the prisoners hijack the aircraft. In a race against time, he joins forces with the US Marshal to prevent the criminals from blowing the plane and all on board to pieces.(n)

programme.title: Point Last Seen
programme.desc: Drama about a woman who feels let down by the justice system which grants her violent husband access to their two children. After her husband abducts the children and vanishes, she takes refuge in the solitude of the desert, where she makes a new career as a tracker. When a young girl disappears, she has to confront her feelings about her own children, and comfort the missing girl's mother.(n)

programme.title: Distorted
programme.desc: Crime. A woman becomes suspicious of the luxury apartment she has just moved into as she begins to receive a series of disturbing subliminal messages.(n)

programme.title: Collateral Damage
programme.desc: Explosive action thriller in which a firefighter, frustrated at the lack of progress being made in the investigation into a terrorist bombing which killed his wife and child, decides to go after those responsible himself.(n)

programme.title: Blood Brother
programme.desc: Action thriller. An avengeful convict is released from jail after 15 years, and he is coming straight for the old pals he feels betrayed him, including one who is now a cop.(n)

programme.title: Paycheck
programme.desc: Sci-fi thriller. A scientist agrees to take on a top-secret job for $90 million, in exchange for having his memory of doing the job erased. When he wakes up penniless he must piece together the events of the last three years - and when he discovers what he was duped into creating, he has to stop his paymasters from getting their hands on it.(n)

programme.title: Breaking In
programme.desc: Crime thriller. Following the sudden death of her estranged father, a mother of two is left with the task of preparing his estate in rural Wisconsin for sale, bringing her young daughter and son along for the journey. While the home evokes memories of her own childhood, her trip down memory lane takes a dark turn when the house - and her kids - come under attack from a violent gang of robbers who will go to terrifying lengths to get what they want.(n)

programme.title: Serenity
programme.desc: Thriller. A fishing boat captain faces a dilemma when his ex-wife begs him to help her and their son - by killing her violent new husband.(n)

programme.title: Gone in 60 Seconds
programme.desc: Tense thriller. Car thief Memphis Raines is forced to steal 50 luxury vehicles in one night in order to save the life of his brother, who has fallen foul of a dangerous crime lord. Once the most successful car thief in California, Raines must reassemble his old gang to fulfil the almost impossible mission. His task is further hampered by a rival band of thieves and the local police.(n)

programme.title: Gran Torino
programme.desc: Drama about a bitter, racist old man who begrudgingly realises his need for redemption. A disgruntled Korean War veteran, Walt Kowalski is openly prejudiced, and doesn't hold back when a family of Hmong people move into his increasingly multicultural neighbourhood. However, when the family's teens come under threat from gangs and bullies, Walt cannot help but intervene. Begrudgingly he forms a bond with them when they try to steal his prized possession, a 1972 Gran Torino car.(n)

programme.title: BlacKkKlansman
programme.desc: Biographical drama about the first black officer to join the Colorado Springs Police Department in the 1970s. Put on filing duty and subjected to slurs from his colleagues, he sets out to prove his worth by attempting to expose the local Ku Klux Klan group - recruiting a Jewish co-worker to go undercover and infiltrate the organisation's ranks.(n)

programme.title: Strange Days
programme.desc: Dark, futuristic thriller, set on the eve of the new millennium, about a black-market trader who deals in stolen dreams. Ex-LA cop Lenny's philosophy is that anything that can be experienced can be recorded - via a headset device originally developed for the police - and sold. When one of his workers is killed, he is plunged into a maze of paranoia and deception - and uncovers a conspiracy that threatens to blow LA apart.(n)

programme.title: Slender Man
programme.desc: Horror about four teenage friends who explore the legend of the Slender Man. After summoning him, the girls soon find themselves in a world of trouble as they realise that there is plenty of truth behind the story of the terrifying mythical figure. When one of the group goes missing and the others suffer from strange visions, fear begins to take over as the haunting affects every aspect of their lives.(n)

programme.title: Flatliners
programme.desc: Psychological horror remake based on the 1990 film of the same name. A group of medical students led by the afterlife-obsessed Courtney search for insights into what awaits them after death by stopping their hearts before being revived again. While the rest of the group are encouraged by the new lease of life Courtney gains from her experience, they are soon subjected to terrifying visions from their past.(n)

programme.title: Ali and Nino
programme.desc: Romantic drama. The love story of Ali and Nino, a young couple, residing in the troubled times of World War. Their relationship is tested when Ali fights with the Bolsheviks, while Nino nurses wounded soldiers during the March Days massacre.(n)

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Modern twist on Beatrix Potter's classic creation. Peter Rabbit and his sisters enjoy troubling Mr McGregor by raiding his vegetable garden. After the death of Mr McGregor, his relative moves in the house and is shocked to meet the unwanted guests. What follows is the battle of wills between the new house owner and the rabbits.(n)

programme.title: Slaughterhouse Rulez
programme.desc: Horror comedy, set at a prestigious boarding school, which comes under attack from blood-hungry creatures. While new student Finn struggles to fit in with his classmates, his stay at the exclusive establishment becomes even more testing when the headmaster allows a fracking company to drill within the school grounds - a move which inadvertently disturbs a gang of murderous monsters.(n)

programme.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: Action-adventure about four misfit classmates who are thrown into a dangerous adventure together after unearthing an old gaming console. Told to serve detention in their school's basement, the group happens across the video game Jumanji and prepares to play. Unaware to them however, the start button transports them into the title's jungle setting - turning the students into the game's characters and forcing them to get through the levels in one piece if they want to escape.(n)

programme.title: Same Kind of Different As Me
programme.desc: Drama. When art dealer Ron admits he is having an affair, his wife does not throw him out but orders him to do voluntary work, where he makes a special friend while serving the homeless.(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure. Newt Scamander is reunited with his old friends from America when Albus Dumbledore asks him to take down the dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald, who has escaped captivity in the second instalment of the Fantastic Beasts series written by JK Rowling.(n)

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Modern twist on Beatrix Potter's classic creation. Peter Rabbit and his sisters enjoy troubling Mr McGregor by raiding his vegetable garden. After the death of Mr McGregor, his relative moves in the house and is shocked to meet the unwanted guests. What follows is the battle of wills between the new house owner and the rabbits.(n)

Unaware to them however, the start button transports them into the title's jungle setting - turning the students into the game's characters and forcing them to get through the levels in one piece if they want to escape.(n)

programme.title: Searching
programme.desc: Tense cyber thriller about a widower's desparate search for his missing daughter. Suspecting the worst after his 16-year-old fails to return home from her study group, the father watches on in frustration as the police fail to uncover any leads. Taking matters into his own hands, he begins combing through the youngster's digital footprint in a bid to find any clues that may lead to her whereabouts.(n)

programme.title: Shoplifters
programme.desc: Crime drama. A family of impoverished grifters eke out a living through petty scams and shoplifting. But their lifestyle starts to unravel when they take in a seemingly abandoned girl from an abusive home and draw her into their life of crime.(n)

programme.title: Lizzie
programme.desc: Thriller based on the infamous 1892 Borden family murders. Financially trapped in the home of her domineering and brutal father, Lizzie Borden forms an intimate friendship with a new maid. When she finds her father plans to leave everything to her stepmother, Lizzie and her lover plot drastic action to pre-empt the bequest.(n)

programme.title: Fast & Furious - Hobbs & Shaw: Special
programme.desc: Sky Cinema delves into the hotly-anticipated action-packed spin off starring Dwayne Johnson, Jason Statham and Idris Elba.(n)

programme.title: Age of Summer
programme.desc: Charming comedy. After relocating with his family, a teenage boy navigates challenges and new relationships as he tries to fit in with the cool kids in the summer of '86.(n)

programme.title: Nobody's Fool
programme.desc: Romantic comedy. Freshly released from prison, an ex-con suspects her high-flying sister is being catfished by an online suitor who may not be all he seems.(n)

programme.title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
programme.desc: Award-winning animated superhero adventure about teenager Nick Morales, who attempts to balance his hectic life with the demands of becoming the new Spider-Man. Weighed down by pressure as he is expected to continue Peter Parker's legacy, a portal to the multiverse brings Morales face to face with his predecessor - and a range of other heroes - as they attempt to bring down the evil Wilson Fisk.(n)

programme.title: Fantastic Beasts: The Crimes of Grindelwald
programme.desc: Fantasy adventure. Newt Scamander is reunited with his old friends from America when Albus Dumbledore asks him to take down the dark wizard Gellert Grindelwald, who has escaped captivity in the second instalment of the Fantastic Beasts series written by JK Rowling.(n)

programme.title: Marriage Material
programme.desc: Romantic comedy. A man is forced to reconsider his values when his fiancee gives him a list of suggested improvements to make him a perfect husband. He reluctantly ropes in friends to help him change, but will it really be for the better?(n)

programme.title: Lizzie
programme.desc: Thriller based on the infamous 1892 Borden family murders. Financially trapped in the home of her domineering and brutal father, Lizzie Borden forms an intimate friendship with a new maid. When she finds her father plans to leave everything to her stepmother, Lizzie and her lover plot drastic action to pre-empt the bequest.(n)

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.(n)

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: Action adventure about an expedition that sets out to find a rare diamond and encounters a sinister lost city in the Congo. An executive sent to locate a blue diamond vital to a business project finds herself in the company of a Romanian fortune hunter and a primatologist. After a perilous journey, they discover the mines that hold the legendary King Solomon's diamonds, but they are closely guarded by savage gorillas.(n)

programme.title: Edward Scissorhands
programme.desc: Poignant, keenly satirical fantasy about a boy with sharp metal shears for hands, who is the creation of an inventor who dies before finishing his work. The boy's years of isolation in an incongruous Gothic castle are ended when a kindly Avon lady takes him into her home in the pastel-coloured suburbs below. His innocence and kindness quickly endear him to the neighbours, but their acceptance of Edward's difference is short-lived. The film marks director Tim Burton's first collaboration with star, Johnny Depp.(n)

programme.title: Shrek Forever After
programme.desc: Animated family adventure. A domesticated Shrek becomes depressed when he believes no one finds him frightening anymore. He makes a deal to get his roar back with an embittered Rumpelstiltskin, who is out to get revenge on the ogre. Shrek finds himself in an alternate reality where he was never born and faces a race to break the spell and rescue Fiona.(n)

programme.title: Last Holiday
programme.desc: Comedy drama about a shy New Orleans shop clerk who, on discovering that she is terminally ill and could be dead within weeks, cashes in her life savings and heads to Europe to see out her days in the lap of luxury and free of the social restraints that have led to her reserved outlook on life.(n)

programme.title: Max Steel
programme.desc: Action-adventure. A teenager, Max, and his alien companion, Steel, harness their powers to evolve into a mighty superhero, Max Steel.(n)

programme.title: American Ultra
programme.desc: A hapless stoner has his life turned upside down when he is revealed to be a deadly sleeper agent in this anarchic action comedy. Store clerk Mike Howell suffers panic attacks whenever he tries to leave the backwoods hometown he's shacked up in with his live-in girlfriend Phoebe. What he doesn't realise is that he is a sleeper government agent with unrivalled martial arts skills just waiting to be activated.(n)

programme.title: World War Z
programme.desc: Apocalypse epic. When the traffic jam retired UN advisor Gerry Lane is sitting in is overrun by military, it quickly becomes clear they are under attack from zombies. Scrambling to get his wife and children to safety, Gerry makes it to New Jersey, where they are taken to an offshore safe zone. There Gerry learns that a global pandemic of zombies has wiped out billions of lives and that, in exchange for the ongoing protection of his family, he must travel to Asia to find the source of the virus.(n)

programme.title: Great Sporting Moments
programme.desc: A look back at the 2000 Olympics in Sydney, a Games headlined by home favourite Cathy Freeman, who would take 400m gold in one of the most memorable moments in all of sport.(n)

programme.title: Great Sporting Moments
programme.desc: With the 1969 Ryder Cup on the line, Jack Nicklaus picked up Englishman Tony Jacklin's putt marker, thus drawing the match. This is often credited as the birth of the modern event.(n)

programme.title: WWE Experience

programme.desc: Documentary series featuring officers fighting to combat animal cruelty across 2,500 square miles of Texas. programme.desc: Documentary looking at how, with technology playing such a central role in everyday life, it will be increasingly difficult to move from place to place without leaving an electronic trace. programme.title: Forensic Detectives

programme.title: Giada in Italy

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Cookery series with Ree Drummond. A big Thanksgiving feast is in the making and Ree is focusing on sides. She makes broccoli wild rice casserole, soul sweet 'taters, brussels sprout dressing and butternut squash with no-knead clover leaf rolls.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Cookery series with Ree Drummond. The completion of the Drummonds' new office offers an excuse to celebrate, with Ree making three-sauce shrimp cocktail, avocado crema, spicy Italian meatballs and sweet brownie pops.(n)

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Cookery series with Ree Drummond. Ree whips up brunch with maple oat nut scones, cowgirl quiche and champagne oranges.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off: The Final
programme.desc: It is the final, with just three of the original twelve bakers remaining. The theme for the final is a Royal Bake Off, as the tent plays host to three challenges to impress the Queen. The last signature challenge sees a return to meringues, a challenge that a few of the bakers stumbled over in week six. For the technical challenge, Mary has made a simple bake very, very tough, as she has only given the bakers one recipe instruction. The rest is down to them. It may be a very British classic, but with no measurements, this is the ultimate test of the final three bakers' intuition. Then on the final day, as the bakers' families gather outside the tent, the finalists face their last show-stopper. This is the most complex one ever seen on Bake Off, and there are the most bakes ever requested in a challenge. With only one oven, it's five solid hours of baking for the finalists to prove they deserve the winner's trophy.(n)

programme.title: The Little Paris Kitchen: Cooking with Rachel Khoo
programme.desc: Food writer and cook Rachel Khoo invites viewers into her tiny Paris kitchen as she brings her creative touch to classic and modern French cuisine, introducing simple and appealing recipes that provide delicious yet achievable results. In this enticing episode, Rachel serves the lightest of desserts, iles flottantes, where delicately poached meringues drift on the creamiest vanilla custard. She samples exquisite Normandy oysters at a stall offering five succulent varieties, then prepares gourmet garnishes with a Parisian chef. Finally, Rachel visits one of Paris's finest street markets and encounters Joel Thiebault, the French 'king of vegetables', who sells to the world's top chefs. Rachel is looking for succulent beetroot for her superb lentil and goat's cheese salad.(n)

programme.title: The Little Paris Kitchen: Cooking with Rachel Khoo
programme.desc: Food writer and cook Rachel Khoo invites viewers into her tiny Paris kitchen as she brings her creative touch to classic and modern French cuisine, introducing simple and appealing recipes that provide delicious yet achievable results. Rachel serves a classic quiche lorraine with a rich creamy filling and melt-in-the-mouth pastry. She also fulfils an all-time desire by turning her hand to crêpe making with a Parisian street vendor, to produce the city's most famous and favourite snack. Plus, she visits a Vietnamese restaurant to explore the latest Asian food trends that are finding fans in Paris. And finally, she serves up her twist on beef wellington - tender venison surrounded by caramelized onions in golden flaky pastry.(n)

programme.title: Hairy Bikers' Best of British
programme.desc: The Bikers continue their culinary journey through time as they celebrate British food. They explore how certain ingredients and recipes can make you feel good and put a spring back in your step. Whether a comforting bowl of chicken noodle soup or a simple fish dish, sometimes the right meal can make all the difference.(n)

programme.title: James Martin: Home Comforts

programme.title: Jamie's 30 Minute Meals
programme.desc: Fast-paced cookery series. Jamie Oliver demonstrates how to make roast beef with Yorkshire puddings, gravy, potatoes and carrots in just half an hour.(n)

programme.title: 30 Minute Meals

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: It's 16-minute summertime and Ree Drummond's making big bad beef skewers with greens and blue cheese mayo for a quick dinner kit. programme.desc: Cookery series with Ree Drummond. Ree's choice ingredient today is chicken, chicken and more chicken; which she demonstrates in three fantastic dishes: slow cooker chicken and broccoli, chicken kale caesar salad and chicken pie.(n)

programme.desc: Steve continues his deadly journey through the southern states of the USA and goes fishin' Texan style and discovers they sure make 'em big. The alligator gar is the largest fresh water fish in North America but nothing can prepare Steve for the near record-breaking seven foot prehistoric monster he reels in. Next Steve investigates a destructive force of nature - the tornado. To simulate their 200 miles per hour deadly winds, the crew fire up the engines of a fighter jet. Standing in the jet flow Steve shows how everyday objects can transform into deadly projectiles. Finally Steve heads south to the swamps of Georgia in search of a huge alligator snapping turtle, and in true Deadly style the crew soon find themselves wading through snake infested waters and surrounded by highly venomous cottonmouth snakes.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Animated series about a pack of brave puppies led by a young boy named Ryder. When Ryder comes across a map showing the location of outlaw Wild Wilbur's buried treasure, Mayor Humdinger grabs the map and runs off to find the loot for himself.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: CGI kids' show about six heroic puppies who work on high-stakes rescue missions to protect the Adventure Bay community.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Animated series about a pack of brave puppies led by a young boy named Ryder. Cap'n Turbot and his cousin Francois are in the middle of an archaeological dig when a rockslide unearths a big dinosaur bone! The trouble is that the rockslide also leaves the Cap'n and Francois perched high up on a very small cliff ledge, so it's up to the pups to rescue them and move the enormous bone to complete the dino skeleton on display in front of the town hall.(n)

programme.title: Arthur

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!

When Pieface rescues Walter and Bertie from danger, Dennis leads the town in celebrating Pieface Day in his honour, and refuses to listen when Pieface tries to tell him it was all a big mistake. Walter uncovers the truth, proclaims himself the bigger hero, and declares it Walter Week!(n)

programme.title: Danger Mouse
programme.desc: It's staff appreciation day at Danger HQ and Squawk and Danger Mouse have two very different ideas on where to go. Penfold has the deciding vote so the pair are busy trying to convince Penfold to pick their choice. With Penfold busy inventing tasks so they can earn his favour no one has noticed that a jam spillage in the professor's experiment has brought a sticky surprise to life - a super-sized jam monster which might just ruin all of their plans.(n)

programme.title: Odd Squad

programme.title: The Deep
programme.desc: Animated series. Pirate boy Smiling Finn comes to the Nektons pleading for help. He wants them to stop his father, Captain Hammerhead, from stealing a treasure that he believes will destroy his family.(n)

programme.title: Newsround
programme.desc: Topical news magazine for children.(n)

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge
programme.desc: Animation based on the film How to Train Your Dragon. When Snoutlout crashes on a mysterious island, he must rely on Astrid, Heather, and Ruffnut to rescue him.(n)

programme.title: The Zoo
programme.desc: Comedy series following real-life animals in a zoo. A countdown of the top 10 clips from across series selected by the narrator and unenthusiastically assisted by Woody the baboon. Highlights include Geoffrey the gorilla's 'nose-flute' masterpiece, birthday cakes accidently being eaten and rapping reptiles, until Woody turns the tables on the narrator to include his 'best bits' or mishaps - from walking into doorframes to being startled by surprise lion roars.(n)

programme.title: The Pets Factor
programme.desc: Documentary series following vets. Cheryl's nerves are jangling when she has to operate on her mum's dog, Hatchiko. Cat treats Ziggy, a fighting feline who's been given a proper shiner and James is in for a surprise when he visits vet nurse Fran to see how his precious porkers, Monte and Belle, are settling in.(n)

programme.title: Step Up to the Plate

programme.title: Junior Bake Off
programme.desc: The country's best young bakers go head to head. Judges Nadiya and Allegra set bakers Nikki, Oli, Elodie and Hamish a 100 per cent British technical challenge - but with a twist. It's Allegra's surprise recipe for 'squashed fly' scones, accompanied by homemade jam and cream. The bakers are relieved to discover that the 'squashed flies' are just currants and they will be more relieved if they can master the show-stopper ombre cake to win a place in the quarter-finals.(n)

programme.title: Millie Inbetween
programme.desc: Comedy drama series about modern family life. Mike tells a horrified Craig that he's planning to ask Mum to marry him. Craig joins forces with Lauren to prevent it - they know what happens when this goes wrong, and they don't want Mike and Mum rushing into another disaster. Despite their efforts to ruin the romantic atmosphere, Mike pops the question - and Mum says yes. Millie's the only one who thinks it'll be fine - but sees what they mean when she's asked out on a date herself. It upsets the happy status quo of her group of friends - and she falls out with Fran. Now she feels the same as Lauren and Craig about the wedding - but Mike is already making plans for the big day.(n)

programme.title: The Next Step
programme.desc: Reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio. Eldon challenges Hunter to win back the nationals solo award. Emily is forced to prove her loyalty to Amanda by ending something that is just starting. James searches for a four-leaf clover for Riley's list.(n)

programme.title: The Next Step
programme.desc: Reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio. Thalia, Giselle, and Amanda represent the Next Step at a trio competition. When Michelle comes to watch, Amanda is forced to change her plans. James tackles number ten on Riley's list and decides to get to know Emily.(n)

programme.title: The Next Step
programme.desc: Children's drama series following the lives of a group of teenage dancers as they compete in a national dance competition. James turns to the boys for help to solve a riddle for Riley. The A-Troupe costumes for nationals go missing. Emily's loyalties are tested.(n)

programme.title: The Next Step
programme.desc: Reality-style drama series following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio. James gets his driving licence for Riley. Michelle searches for something she loves as much as dance and joins the debate team at school. Amanda learns that Emily cannot be trusted.(n)

programme.title: The Next Step
programme.desc: Reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio. Emily tries to expose Amanda but gets caught in her own trap. Kate discovers the Next Step's money is missing and holds Chloe responsible. Riley enlists James to take CPR training for the studio with her.(n)

programme.title: The Next Step
programme.desc: Reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio. Amanda's true colours are exposed, and the results are devastating for the Next Step. Emily catches West doing a good deed. Riley enlists James to convince a studio ex-member to come back.(n)

programme.title: The Next Step
programme.desc: Reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio. Officially back together, Riley and James struggle to find their chemistry on the dance floor. Emily and West get to know each other better. Michelle gets a boost to her confidence from an old friend.(n)

programme.title: The Next Step
programme.desc: Reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio. Successful choreographer Luther Brown drops in on the Next Step to help the boys with their small group routine. Thalia and Giselle are in a rush to try to teach Michelle the nationals routine. James gives Eldon dating advice.(n)

programme.title: The Dumping Ground: I'm Floss
programme.desc: Dumping Ground characters gather to watch videos made by Ashdene Ridge residents about their lives there. Featuring a mixture of new scenes and classic moments from The Dumping Ground and Tracy Beaker Returns. This time it is Floss's turn.(n)

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Did you know that the Victorians invented films? Not only that, but one of the first stars of the moving image was Queen Victoria! Using real footage recently restored by the BFI, this special show takes a Horribly Historical look at the Victorians' obsession with film. We see some of Queen Vicky's very first filmic appearances (also featuring an initially reluctant Tsar Nicholas I), and also how the Victorians became obsessed with filming everything, from their holidays abroad to strapping cameramen to the front of a moving train (using only ropes) to make 'Phantom Ride' films.Along the way we also meet the Lumiere brothers (one of whom looks a lot like First Dates' Fred Sirieix), Kaiser Wilhelm II, notable Victorian actor Herbert Beerbohm Tree, and we see that the Victorians were also early adopters of Fake News. The episode ends with a show-stopping song that traces the evolution of film from the Victorians' first forays through to the blockbusters we see in the multiplexes today.(n)

programme.title: The Dumping Ground
programme.desc: Drama series set in a children's home. Jay's plan to seize the day brings him face to face with the memories of his childhood.(n)

programme.title: OOglies Funsize
programme.desc: Stop-motion animation. Toast soldiers take to the skies in their toast-rack helicopter, Maki and Iso ambush a suspicious Nigiri in a ninja sushi attack, and intrepid star bar attempts an ambitious trip to the moon. Also, Frankfurter's monster comes to life in the back of the mouldy fridge and Stunt Tomato amazes the judges with a death-defying magic trick.(n)

programme.title: Danger Mouse
programme.sub-title: The Toad Who Would Be King
programme.desc: Animated series. Danger Mouse hunts for Baron von Greenback. He is nowhere to be found, but then what is this? The baron pops up on Penfold's favourite TV game show Who Wants to Marry a Queen. Danger Mouse is tasked with escorting the Queen of Goldlandia on her official visit to London with her new husband, the Baron. Colonel K orders DM to serve and protect the new King Greenback! Subjected to humiliation after humiliation at the hands of his former nemesis, DM takes his eye off the ball and the queen is kidnapped along with the baron's daughter Delilah. Both he and the baron naturally blame one another. An urgent call for help from Delilah leads to the baron and DM racing into a trap. Delilah has kidnapped the queen and now has both her father AND Danger Mouse on a sinking Toadlantis. Can DM thwart Delilah's thirst for power as she tries to crown herself the new Queen of Goldlandia?(n)

programme.title: OOglies
programme.desc: When the humans are away the OOglies play! The eccentric ensemble of household pranksters sprout eyes and clown around, embarking on a series of adventures that find them slipping, sliding and splatting onto television screens. The OOglies are up to more prankster playfulness as Boo Potato scares up some laughs, manly Monkey Wrench gets a girly makeover with a difference and the Battery Brothers take over a robot to zap the marauding monster known only as 9Volter!(n)

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
programme.desc: Animated series. Dennis and the gang train Bertie in the art of standing up to people so he can rebel against Walter's bossiness - but they train him too well and he becomes a dangerous rebel without a clue!(n)

programme.title: Odd Squad
programme.desc: The Odd Squad investigate strange events. In this two-part episode, the tube system breaks and Olive and Otto are left stranded in a dangerous forest.(n)

programme.title: Diddy TV
programme.desc: Diddy Dick Dom have their very own TV station. Shows include dancing diddies in The Diddy Step, music in Diddy Pops and a heartbreaking documentary about a boy with a spoon for a nose.(n)

programme.sub-title: The Return of the Freaky Twins

programme.title: Matilda and the Ramsay Bunch
programme.sub-title: The Fresh Eggs of Bel Air
programme.desc: Setting up a chicken farm in their Bel Air back garden is the perfect way for Tilly to expand the Ramsay family and get super fresh eggs to cook with. Using her best powers of persuasion she gets mum Tana to agree and drafts in sister Holly to help. Travelling along the Californian coast to Malibu they meet up with expert urban farmer Helene Henderson, who gives them two of her beautiful chickens and advice on starting Tilly's farm. After settling the new Ramsays into their coop, Tilly makes lunch for her hungry farm workers, mum and holly: a show-stopping brooding hen cake, yummy eggy bread and a Cobb salad with a ranch dressing.(n)

programme.title: Operation Ouch!
programme.desc: Dr Chris and Dr Xand show how incredible the human body is. The doctors test a new theory to see if they can find out why skin goes wrinkly in the bath, Dr Chris meets a patient taking part in groundbreaking heart research, and there is a test of the power of eyes. Meanwhile, there are more medical mysteries in Ouch & About, and over in accident and emergency one patient has a very sore head and another has dislocated her jaw.(n)

programme.title: Horrible Histories

Robert Walpole struggles to talk to England's German king, a Scottish sportsman attacks dead cows in the Highland Games, American inventor Paul Revere demonstrates his gunpowder toothpaste and the Roman emperors channel the King of Pop in their musical argument over who's baddest of all.(n)

programme.title: This Is CBeebies
programme.desc: Welcome to the CBeebies channel. Programmes start at 6.00am.(n)

programme.title: Show Me Show Me
programme.desc: Chris and Pui investigate and explore within their magical playroom in the sky, bringing objects and ideas to life. Stuffy is dressed as a stripy bee, so Chris and Pui take a look at real bees through the telescope, then buzz all around the playroom with the toys, collecting pollen to take back to their pretend hive. Then they look at knees and play a game of Teddington Says. Rapunzel trips over her hair in the cafe and bumps her knee, but Chris can't quite hear what she needs to feel better, so he gets her meal all wrong.(n)

programme.title: Twirlywoos
programme.desc: Stop-motion preschool programme about the adventures of four inquisitive Twirlywoos. The Twirlywoos learn about small things when they pursue a tiny butterfly around a butterfly house. Back on the boat, they are tickled by a mysterious creature who keeps getting smaller to avoid being caught.(n)

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Preschool series. The Teletubbies take selfies with the Tubby Phone and a child in Tummy Tales has their photo taken in a photo booth with their grandparent. Then it's time for a Tubby Phone Dance.(n)

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Stop-frame animated series featuring Raa Raa and his friends, who solve very noisy mysteries in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. Raa Raa is sure he has found the perfect present for each of his friends, but some of his packages get mixed up.(n)

programme.title: Numberblocks
programme.desc: It's time for the grand finale but the number fun doesn't stop here: there's so much more to explore! Step into the wonderful wider world of numbers with the Numberblocks.(n)

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Children's animation. Bing and Flop are in the park when they see Pando on a skateboard. Bing is full of awe as he watches Pando skate up and down. He can't wait to have a go himself, but it's much harder to balance than Pando made it look. Bing falls off and bumps his knee, but Pando finds a clever way to help Bing get his confidence back.(n)

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Children's animation. Bing is at Amma's creche when a butterfly flies in and lands on Sula's painting. Bing tries to help the butterfly go back outside by picking it up, but he holds it too tightly and the poor butterfly is squished. Flop and Amma help the sad children say goodbye to the butterfly.(n)

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Animated preschool series. Duggee has something really interesting to show at the clubhouse. Can the Squirrels find some other interesting things to share?(n)

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Animated preschool series. Duggee is cleaning out his cupboard when he comes across Bucky, his old rocking horse. The Squirrels help Duggee to mend Bucky so he feels brand new again and in return they get to ride him.(n)

programme.title: Bitz and Bob
programme.desc: Animated preschool series introducing children to science and engineering. It's the day of the kite festival and first up are Zip and Pop, who dazzle the crowd with their performance. Then Bitz and Bob take to the arena, but their kites don't even get off the ground. Finally it's Bevel and Purl's turn, but Bevel tries kite-flying with no hands and loses them. Things take a turn for the worse when Zip grabs on to Pop's kite and gets swept away by the wind. Bitz and Bob have to work out how to get their kites to fly in order to rescue Zip.(n)

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.sub-title: The Tale of the Tunnel Rumbler
programme.desc: Animated series. When Peter and his friends mistake the echoey 'rebbits' of a lost Jeremy Fisher for a scary monster, they set about ridding their tunnels of this mysterious invader. But with Tommy Brock on the warpath nearby, it will not be easy!(n)

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: Meet the Go Jetters, four explorers on a global adventure with their teacher Ubercorn - a disco-loving unicorn. When Grim HQ's heating gets stuck on, Glitch looks for a cold place to land and cool down. Meanwhile, the Go Jetters enjoy the cool sights of Harbin Ice City in China. Every year sculptors at the festival create realistic models of world-famous landmarks from blocks of ice, and Lars is attempting to carve the Eiffel Tower. Suddenly the sculptures around them begin to melt. The team investigates why everything is heating up and discovers a red hot Grim HQ sat in the middle of the festival. If they don't move it quickly, Harbin Ice City will melt!(n)

programme.title: Octonauts
programme.desc: Animated deep sea adventure series. Captain Barnacles and his intrepid band of explorers roam the oceans in search of adventure and fun. When two young leafy sea dragons are accidentally separated from their father and brought onboard the Octopod, the Octonauts must find them before they end up in Kwazii's stew.(n)

programme.title: Biggleton
programme.desc: Preschool series in which children pretend to be grown-ups in an imaginary town. Everyone's getting ready for Frankie the Business Woman's big party. Hairdresser Sam is giving Police Officer Liam and Professor Millie fancy hairdos, and Ava the Postie delivers a tower of parcels full of party treats to Frankie's house. Aleem the Baker has baked some chocolate chip cookies - will Frankie buy any of those for the party? But Frankie the Business Woman is busy on the phone. Ava overhears her saying she wants something to be flattened with a big roller. Ava tells everyone in the hairdressers that Frankie the Business Woman is going to flatten Biggleton. This is bad news and now nobody feels like partying. Instead they start marching to 'Save Biggleton'.(n)

programme.title: Justin's House
programme.desc: Justin Fletcher entertains a live audience of children with singing, dancing and comedy chaos. Robert invites supercool pop star Bustin Grooves to lunch, but no matter what they do, Bustin just won't sing. Guest starring Darren Hart.(n)

programme.title: Tee and Mo
programme.desc: Tee wants his bike to go faster so Mo suggests she remove the stabilizers. Tee needs some convincing.(n)

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'egg' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of different eggs - a brown egg, a white egg, we even see inside an egg. There's a dippy egg, a fried egg, an egg being laid and what will come out of the hatching egg? There's a gold egg, a cold egg and Dee and her friends even have an egg and spoon race!(n)

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: Educational fun. The adventures of 26 lively letters who can make words come to life by holding hands. T has such a tip-top time making words with his friends that he invites S to join him - and soon wishes he hadn't. If only he could start the whole day over again! This episode has fun with the 'st' blend and the words top, tub, tag, stop, stub, stag, lost and best.(n)

programme.title: Kit and Pup
programme.desc: Preschool series introducing children to scientific opposites and materials. Today Kit and Pup are out and about. Can you see who is going over the bridge and who is going under the bridge?(n)

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Children's animation. Bing wants to draw a big picture, so Flop finds him some chalk to draw on the pavement. Bing draws a fabulous stripy, spotty, zig-zag dinosaur, but just as he has finished, a rain shower washes the dinosaur away. Bing is devastated until he sees that a bit of dinosaur is left behind, and with that new beginning there is another chalk something waiting to be created.(n)

programme.title: Twirlywoos
programme.desc: Stop-motion preschool programme about the adventures of four inquisitive Twirlywoos. The Twirlywoos are hiding behind a garden wall, watching a man with a hosepipe. The man starts to wind the hosepipe in, making it shorter and shorter. The Twirlywoos decide they'd like to try making the hosepipe shorter too - much to the man's surprise. Back on the Big Red Boat, the Twirly Screen entertains with a line. When the line jumps off the screen, the Twirlywoos jump on it, but every time they do, it gets shorter and shorter.(n)

programme.title: Something Special
programme.desc: Using a sign language called Makaton, Something Special helps its audience learn how to communicate, as well as develop their language in a fun and exciting way. Justin and his friends get ready for a big dance performance at Blackpool Ballroom. Meanwhile, Mr Tumble is also in the mood for dancing and holds a dance competition with the toys.(n)

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Preschool series. When the lights go out in the Home Dome, the Teletubbies get the giggles! The lights come back on again and there is Tubby Custard mess everywhere.(n)

programme.title: The Baby Club
programme.desc: Giovanna and Baby Bear welcome babies Tobias, Inam, Isaac, Enya, Hawa, Jean and their grown-ups to The Baby Club. Parents, carers and their babies at home are invited to join in with all the fun activities too! Inside everyone's bags in this episode are shakers and rattles which are explored through discovery, play, song and story. Grown-ups at home are encouraged to take part by hiding baby appropriate shaker or rattle inside a fabric bag or pillowcase for them to reveal and explore with their baby! The fun song 'Dingle Dangle Scarecrow' features, as does a story involving Baby Bear. Plus, the Together Song gets everyone moving about, before some calm time with bubbles and the Goodbye Song.(n)

programme.title: Patchwork Pals
programme.desc: Preschool children's series about a group of animals that live together on a huge patchwork blanket. All the Patchwork Pals are sleeping deeply - except the Owl. But why is she awake at night?(n)

programme.title: Olobob Top
programme.desc: When Big Fish is sad that she can't go on a holibob with the Olobobs, they manage to bring their holiday to her - with the help of the Olobob Top!(n)

programme.title: Small Potatoes
programme.desc: Animated series about a group of potatoes who sing songs in different genres. Chip sings a heartfelt song about being a potato. Though he cannot do many physical things, he is proud of who he is.(n)

programme.title: Let's Play
programme.desc: Preschool show exploring the magic of play through dressing up, role play and pretending. Rebecca steps through the Magic Curtain to play firefighters. Can she save the day and put out the fire at the bakery, and will Carrotcake the parrot be safe?(n)

programme.title: Get Well Soon Hospital
programme.desc: Children's series. Dr Ranj and his puppet patients explore medical conditions at the hospital using music and humour. Visiting Dr Ranj at the hospital is Riz, who is having a chest x-ray to make sure his lungs are working properly. Riz is learning to play the recorder, so it is important for him to have plenty of puff! Dr Ranj explains how x-rays pass through Riz's body to take special photos that will show the inside of his chest.(n)

programme.title: My Pet and Me
programme.desc: Series showing children what it really means to have a pet. Rory visits a petting farm and meets up with Karim, Alex and Wiki to find out more. They meet Carol who works there, and together they clean out the miniature donkeys' stable. They have fun meeting lots of different animals at the farm.(n)

programme.title: My Petsaurus
programme.desc: Preschool series about a seven-year-old girl and her troublesome pet triceratops. Chloe and Topsy are playing a game of fetch in the park, or at least they're trying to, but Topsy doesn't seem to quite understand the rules.(n)

programme.title: Show Me Show Me
programme.desc: Children's programme. Momo goes for a ride in a hot-air balloon, and Chris and Pui make a giant patchwork picture.(n)

programme.title: My World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Ryan's Vietnamese Pork and Prawn Cha
programme.desc: Preschool series celebrating foods from a rich diversity of backgrounds. Ryan's mum is Vietnamese and he is cooking a dish from Vietnam that she has taught him. He works hard in the kitchen mixing lots of ingredients together, including pork, prawns and fresh mint. He even finds time to teach us the Vietnamese word for egg! One of Ryan's ingredients is fresh mint, but not all of Ryan's friends like the taste or smell of it at first. Some of them even think it smells like toothpaste! Let's hope they like the taste of the fresh mint once it is cooked in the food. Ryan also decorates a beautiful Vietnamese style table and treats his friends to sweet fruit after the meal.(n)

programme.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
programme.desc: Preschool comedy drama series about a family with a magical talking dog. The Brooklyn-Bells take Waffle round to Mrs Hobbs' house to show her what a good dog he's become. She's very impressed until she discovers Waffle has gone missing.(n)

programme.title: What's the Big Idea?
programme.desc: Preschool animation exploring ideas and promoting thinking skills, encouraging viewers to make up their own minds. Hugo explores what art is by looking at all sorts of weird and wonderful paintings, sculptures and photos. And he learns that art can make you feel all kind of feelings!(n)

programme.title: Katie Morag
programme.sub-title: Katie Morag and the Two Peas
programme.desc: Live-action children's show set in Scotland. Katie Morag's Uncle Matthew lives over on the other side of the island and is a bit of a hermit. Mr McColl goes over to check up on him every now and again, and for the first time ever Katie Morag is allowed to accompany him. She is delighted, because she's been feeling rather grumpy towards her little brother Liam, and also she is curious to see Uncle Matthew.(n)

programme.title: Sarah & Duck
programme.desc: Animation. The Ribbon Sisters invite Sarah and Duck to their favourite seasonal event in the park.(n)

programme.title: Biggleton

programme.title: Masha and the Bear
programme.sub-title: Holiday on Ice/First Day of School/No Trespassing!/Hide and Seek is not for the Weak/Watch Out!/Little Cousin/Get Well Soon!/..
programme.desc: ...Recipe for Disaster/Laundry Day Children's animation. The impatient Masha, is eager to go ice skating and manages to drag Bear outside in order to awaken him. Now he has no choice but to teach her. With the beginning of September, Masha, like all the children, wants to go to school and asks the Bear to make her a desk. The Bear patiently waits to collect the harvest of carrots. And so does the hungry hare. Masha wants to play hide and seek. But the Bear has other plans in mind. Knowing that it is impossible to go against her wishes, he agrees to play with her. The Bear wakes up a bump on his head and a biathlon cup but can't remember what happened. Masha and the hare tell their stories and The Bear has to decide which one is true. The Bear's cousin Panda comes over to visit. Masha immediately wants to spend time playing games. But a competitive spirit arises as they can't share anything. Tired from Masha's endless games, the Bear pretends to be sick so she will leave him alone.(n)

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.sub-title: Cry Wolf/Fireman James/The Why Files/King of the Mountain/Hide and Seek/Fiery Football
programme.desc: Children's animation. Norman accidentally sets off Dilys' new fire alarm, so she confiscates his football. To get it back, he sets the alarm off again, and again when a fox enters the shop. James is keen to be a firefighter and listens to calls to Jupiter on his walkie-talkie. After one call he gets to Norman and Lion first and helps rescue them. Norman and Hannah set themselves up as The Why Files - investigators of the mysterious mysteries of Pontypandy and one of their first cases involves strange goings on near the cliffs. Tom and Moose take the Pontypandy Pioneers on a mountain climbing expedition. Trevor takes the girls of Pontypandy to Newtown to see a One Way Street concert. But when the bus skids off the road, Mandy still wants to keep going and gets into danger. Norman is hurrying out the door blowing a vuvuzela, excited to watch the sporting event of the year - a football match between the Flaming Hoses and Pontypandy United.(n)

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.sub-title: Hoist Away/Pop up Shops/Yard Muddle/Roley's Speech/Muck the Chauffeur
programme.desc: Children's animation. Bob is building a boat repair workshop for Curtis, but when Leo gets his wiring wrong the new boat hoist goes haywire. When Bob and the team build pop-up shops out of shipping containers, Scoop decides he wants to use his wild imagination and be an architect. While the team tidies and make repairs to the yard, an over eager Shifter manages to lock Scoop and Muck in the garages, and then strand Bob and Wendy on the roof. The team is building a hard court. Roley promises to explain to Saffi, at the end of the day, how they did it. As the day progresses the expected audience grows and Roley panics! Bob and the team are building refreshment kiosks. But when Muck is helping Mr Bentley by being his chauffeur as well as getting materials for Bob, things end up in the wrong place.(n)

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: Mike's Whistle/The Lost Puff/Useful Railway/Kevin's Cranky Friend/Thomas the Babysitter/Scruff's Makeover
programme.desc: Children's animation. Duck's driver boils an egg in his whistle, which is now clogged. The engines tease Duck about his whistle, especially Mike who says engines without whistles are improper engines. Paxton the diesel engine has been told not to be silly, but when he wobbles over a bumpy track he can't help but think it's fun. Rex boasts to the small engines about how easy wool deliveries are, but Willie the tractor driver accidentally drops his load of wool onto the tracks, which causes Rex to derail. Cranky the crane is very busy down at Brendam Docks. He struggles to keep on schedule, so the Fat Controller decides to send Kevin from the Steamworks to help him. Thomas, Annie and Clarabel have to deal with a noisy baby. When the Fat Controller sees how rusty and dirty Scruff looks, he insists that he goes straight to the Steamworks to be repainted.(n)

programme.title: Molang
programme.sub-title: The Jungle/The Highland Games/Ting Tong/The Soccer Match/The Sled/MC Molang/The Rodeo/The Food-Truck
programme.desc: Animation. In the middle of the jungle, Molang and Piu Piu's car breaks down. They continue on foot, but Piu Piu is terrified: the jungle is full of wild beasts! During a trip to Scotland, Molang and Piu Piu stumble across a caber (tree trunk) tossing competition! They find themselves dragged into the Scottish games. During a visit to the zoo, Molang and Piu Piu see a very melancholic gorilla. Piu Piu manages to cheer him up, but after they leave, the big ape longs only for Piu Piu's return. Molang plays in a soccer game while Piu Piu cheers him from the stands. After a shot from the opposing team, the goalie knocks himself out. Piu Piu must replace him! Molang and Piu Piu are having great fun on a luge - until they break it! When they find an old LP, Molang and Piu Piu become passionate about DJing, much to their neighbours' chagrin. Molang and Piu Piu attend a rodeo.(n)

programme.desc: Children's animation. Charlie is having a day at the beach with James and Sarah. But today is not Charlie's day. It seems that everything he does turns in to a disaster and makes him look uncool. Norman Price and Trevor Evans discover an ammonite on the beach which inspires Norman to create the illusion of real dinosaurs for James and Sarah. As a surprise for her mum Helen, Mandy creates the 'Garden Force', a team dedicated to renovating the Floods' front garden and making it the best garden in Pontypandy. Mandy offers to babysit Lily when Helen Flood invites Mrs Chen and Penny over for a girls' night in, but things take a dangerous turn when some curling tongs start a fire. programme.title: Let's Get Physical
programme.desc: US sitcom about two fitness gurus who face off at the National Aerobics Championships. The life of boozy cover band singer Joe Force changes when he finds out that his father, Colonel Tom Force, the Godfather of Aerobics, has died of a heart attack. When Joe returns home, he finds out that he will only get his multi-million dollar inheritance if he beats his old rival, Barry Cross, at the next Competitive Aerobics Championships. Barry happens to be the person who beat Joe in the same competition years ago, in high school. He's also the guy who married Claudia, Joe's former flame. Can Joe take on his father's challenge? With the help of his mother Janet, a former beauty queen and partner in Colonel Force's fitness empire, Joe attempts to recapture his old glory and win his inheritance.(n)

programme.title: Let's Get Physical
programme.desc: US sitcom about two fitness gurus who face off at the National Aerobics Championships. Joe and Janet also meet the first (and only) dancers to audition for the Fitness by Force team, Clarence and Snacks. Barry and Claudia begin recruiting dancers for the Metrix team, but when Metrix employee Tina is left out, Joe and Janet ask her to join the squad.(n)

programme.title: Let's Get Physical
